programme.title: J.K.K S5
programme.desc: Seluruh penduduk Kampung Kalut mempercayai Wak Gagak (Che Man) setelah dia berjaya menghilangkan kesakitan yang dialami mereka. Suatu hari, Pak Din demam panas. Bijan berkata sekarang semua penduduk sudah tidak perlu risau kalau sakit kerana mereka ada Wak Gagak. Wak Gagak juga turut gunakan kuasa nya untuk pikat hati Lola. Kojack dengan Salman ada menyimpan rasa curiga terhadap Wak Gagak dan mula mengintip pergerakan Wak Gagak. Namun, kehebatan Wak Gagak bukanlah seperti yang disangka. Dia ada kuasa pukau.(n)

programme.title: Hey! Mr Spotlight S1
programme.desc: Raisya merajuk kerana dipaksa untuk terima lelaki yang dia tidak kenali. Raisya memberitahu Shira yang dia telah punya pilihan dan Shira mahu Raisya membawa lelaki itu kerumah. Raisya memang menaruh hati terhadap Azraf tetapi mustahil dia mampu untuk memberitahu Azraf apa yang dia rasa apatah lagi untuk mempelawanya ke rumah. Macam-macam helah yang Raisya guna untuk membawa Azraf ke rumah tetapi Azraf yang telah menghidu rancangan Raisya sengaja memberikan seribu alasan. Azraf sebenarnya mahu Raisya membuat pengakuan yang dia menyintai Azraf. Dan itu tidak mungkin akan berlaku.(n)

programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang empat sahabat berusia pertengahan yang mempunyai minat yang sama iaitu terhadap motorsikal. Ia memaparkan tentang perjalanan mereka sebagai `mat moto otai`.(n)

programme.title: Lubuk

programme.title: In Person S2
programme.desc: Dalam rancangan In Person setiap episod membawa sekumpulan muzik tempatan tanah air yang berbeza dengan keunikan mereka yang tersendiri. Setiap episod menampilkan sesi temubual bersama ahli kumpulan secara mendalam dan rakaman persembahan mereka secara langsung.(n)

programme.title: Jom Masak S1
programme.desc: Minggu ini jom masak bersama Shahrel Fikri & emaknya untuk menampilkan resepi dari mereka. Jom Masak adalah sebuah rancangan masakan melibatkan Pemain Bola Sepak bagi setiap episod . Ia turut diselitkan dengan unsur sketsa dan komedi untuk menjadikan rancangan ini lebih menarik dan menghiburkan penonton . Rancangan ini turut memberikan tip masakan kepada penonton mengikut petua-petua dalam menyediakan masakan yang enak.(n)

programme.title: Selipar Jepun Stileto Merah S1
programme.desc: Stila dan Leto menetap di kawasan perumahan yang sama. Namun kediaman mereka terpisah dengan sebatang jalan yang membezakan kawasan perumahan golongan kaya dengan bawahan. Apakah yang berlaku seterusnya? Mampukah cinta mereka bersatu akhirnya?(n)

programme.title: Isteri Dalam Sangkar S1
programme.desc: Aisyah hilang arah, dia tidak tahu kemana dia harus pergi. Keadaan Aisyah yang di halau sehelai sepinggan menyebabkan Aisyah kelaparan dan kepenatan. Aisyah singgah di perhentian bus dan bermalam di situ. Angin yang kuat pada malam itu memaksa Aisyah mencari tempat yang tertutup untuk berteduh. Tubuh lesu, keletihan dan kelaparan membuatkan Aisyah tidak mampu berjalan dengan baik. Seseorang sedang memerhatikan Aisyah, Aisyah berjalan dalam hujan berbumbungkan kotak yang sudah hancur di basahi hujan. Sebuah kereta datang meluru ke arah Aisyah, Aisyah sempat mengelak tetapi malangnya dia tercampak jauh dan menyebabkan dia tidak sedarkan diri. Iskandar terjaga dari tidurnya, dia merasakan ada sesuatu yang tidak kena yang terjadi pada Aisyah. Iskandar segera keluar dari kondo dan mencari Aisyah.(n)

programme.title: Ana Love Ente
programme.desc: Natrah Khalil, pelakon terkenal dan bersara dari dunia lakonan selepas berkahwin dengan Megat Najmi, salah seorang anak VVIP secara tertutup. Selepas 5 tahun berkahwin, Natrah mula merasai bosan dengan rutin kehidupan hariannya dan mula membandingkan akaun IG miliknya dengan kawan-kawannya yang masih lagi aktif dalam dunia lakonan.(n)

programme.title: J.K.K S5

Pak Kodi menawarkan Pakcik Roy berniaga sebelah warung Pak Kodi. Ramai penduduk beli makanan di warung Pakcik Roy. Mereka memuji masakan Pakcik Roy yang sedap itu. Pak Kodi agak terasa. Lola kesian dengan Pak Kodi kerana dia lihat Pakcik Roy banyak mengambil kesempatan di atas kebaikan Pak Kodi.(n)

programme.title: Halalkan Hati Yang Ku Curi S1
programme.desc: Nenda Delisha sejak awal pagi menasihati anak menantunya yang langsung tak bimbang tentang Delisha. Dalam pada itu, Zainal mendapati sikap Salima berbeza. Rupanya hubungan Zainal akhir-akhir ini, sukar untuk mendapatkan Delisha angkara Salima penghalangnya. Kebetulan Delisha mengajak Faiq keluar "shopping". Faiq sekali gus membantu Salima. Semasa Faiq berdua-duaan "shopping\.(n)

programme.title: Halalkan Hati Yang Ku Curi S1
programme.desc: Delisha semakin menyukai Faiq dan mereka sering keluar hingga lewat malam. Tingkahlaku itu membuatkan nendanya terus bimbang, nendanya berbincang dengan ibu bapa Delisha serta Ustaz Ghazali untuk menjodohkan Delisha dengan Ustaz Ghazali. Delisha membantah. programme.title: Patahnya Sebelah Sayap S1
programme.desc: Alisha merasa tertekan sehingga beliau membuat sarapan untuk adiknya Lin yang telah meninggal dunia. Beliau terpaksa membuang semua pakaian Lin kerana hendak melupakan segala kenangan bersamanya. Pada masa yang sama Khuzairi marah dengan Amzar yang telah memberikan satu projek kepada sebuah syarikat yang bermasalah. Amzar telah menjadi seperti orang gila apabila pihak pengurusan KAPS, mengetahui bahawa dia terlibat dengan kegiatan rasuah. Khuzairi merasa kecewa apabila Alisha enggan menerima cek pemberiannya. Khuzairi menagih kasih dari Alisah tetapi tidak dilayan olehnya. Amzar telah menjadi serba salah apabila Khuzairi mengetahui bahawa Amzar adalah pembunuh sebenar isterinya, Tania.(n)

programme.title: Sensasi Bola S1
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.(n)

programme.title: J.K.K S2
programme.desc: Dewan Kampung Kalut meriah dengan kenduri kahwin anak saudara Pak Din. Bijan memberitahu kemungkinan esok akan ada YB datang melawat kampung mereka. Ada dua orang luar datang ke warung Pak Kodi . Pak Kodi dan Ucop sangkakan itu YB dengan Datin. Mereka sebenarnya bukan YB dengan Datin. Tetapi, disebabkan penduduk itu percaya, mereka teruskan penyamaran. YB dengan Datin melawat kedai Bijan, setelah itu, ke kedai Jepun Mikan dan akhir sekali ke dewan. Di dewan, sewaktu memberi ucapan, YB cuba beritahu hal sebenar yang mereka bukan YB dan Datin. Dia memberitahu dia merupakan pemandu kepada YB.(n)

programme.title: Girls Only S1

programme.title: Hanya Kau Yang Satu
programme.desc: ARLISA, merupakan seorang pelajar kolej yang sedang bercinta dengan seorang lelaki bernama Nazri sejak dibangku sekolah lagi. Arlisa menyambung pengajiannya di sebuah universiti semata untuk mengejar impiannya menjadi seorang wartawan. Hubungan yang terjalin sudah menjangkau enam tahun dan hubungan mereka tidak pernah goyah dek kerana orang ketiga. Mereka saling sayang menyayangi dan sangat setia. Malangnya, Nazri seorang lelaki yang panas baran, mudah melenting dan suka memarahi Arlisa hanya disebabkan perkara yang kecil. Pun begitu, Nazri tidak menyukai impian yang sedang dibawa oleh Arlisa kerana bimbang jika Arlisa akan bermain mata dengan orang lain. Meskipun Nazri tidak pernah menyokong Arlisa namun Nazri sentiasa bersama Arlisa. Sikap melulu Nazri sememangnya tidak digemari oleh Arlisa sendiri. Puan Zalinda iaitu ibu Arlisa tidak menyukai Nazri disebabkan sikap Nazri yang tidak matang. Nazri merupakan seorang lelaki yang bekerjaya sebagai manager di syarikat bapanya. Disebabkan itu, Nazri sering merasakan bahawa tiada lelaki lain yang lebih layak untuk memiliki Arlisa selain dirinya. Pernah suatu hari, Damia iaitu rakan baik Arlisa telah berjumpa Nazri dan memarahi Nazri kerana mengkasari Arlisa, sejak itu Nazri mula naik angin setiap kali melihat Arlisa bersama Damia. Nazri merasakan Arlisa telah menceritakan hal hubungan mereka kepada orang lain. Suatu hari, kerana terlalu marah Nazri telah meninggalkan Arlisa di tepi jalan hanya disebabkan hal kecil. Walaupun sikap Nazri seperti itu Arlisa masih mampu bertahan bersama Nazri dan cuba memahami dan menerima setiap tindakan yang dilakukan Nazri. Meskipun Arlisa seorang yang tegas dan mempunyai pendirian yang tetap tetapi apabila bersama Nazri, Arlisa akan kelihatan seolah lemah. Ini kerana rasa sayang dan cinta Arlisa yang sudah tersemai lama terhadap Nazri. Sementara Nazri tetap akan memujuk Arlisa kembali dan akhirnya dengan mudah Arlisa akan memaafkan Nazri tanpa mempertikaikan sikap buruk Nazri. Puan Zalinda tidak menyenangi sikap Nazri dan sering memberi nasihat kepada Arlisa untuk membuat keputusan tentang hubungannya dengan Nazri. Oleh kerana terlalu yakin dan mempercayai Nazri, Arlisa hanya membutakan mata dan memekakkan telinga dengan kutukan orang yang mempertikaikan tindakan Arlisa yang masih sanggup bertahan bersama Nazri. Sehingga suatu hari, sedang asyik Arlisa dan Damia mengulangkaji di halaman rumah, Nazri datang pada pertengahan malam dan berlaku kekecohan sehingga mengejutkan Puan Zalinda yang sedang tidur. Puan Zalinda melihat sendiri Nazri sedang mengkasari Arlisa. Ketika itu, Puan Zalinda sudah hilang sabar dan meminta agar Nazri segera beredar sebelum Puan Zalinda mengambil tindakan. Namun, Nazri enggan beredar dan masih kelihatan tidak berpuas hati. Disebabkan oleh tindakan Nazri yang begitu marah dan merosakkan nota-nota exam Arlisa dan menyebabkan jiran tetangga terjaga, Arlisa nekad dan bertegas untuk meninggalkan Nazri.(n)

Apakah yang berlaku seterusnya? Mampukah cinta mereka bersatu akhirnya?(n)

programme.title: Isteri Dalam Sangkar S1
programme.desc: Aisyah berada di sebuah kampong, dia baru sedarkan diri akibat kemalangan itu. Kepala Aisyah berdarah teruk sehingga tidak mampu mengingati siapa dirinya. Kini Aisyah tinggal bersama pasangan suami isteri Anim dan Azri serta anak mereka Amani. Mereka telah menjumpai Aisyah yang terbaring di jalan dan telah merawat Aisyah selama Aisyah tidak sedarkan diri selama 3 hari. Aisyah benar-benar tidak dapat mengingati siapa dirinya yang sebenar. Anim telah member nama sementara ingatan Aisyah masih belum pulih dengan nama NUR.(n)

programme.desc: Memaparkan enam artis-artis yang ambil bahagian cabaran Jangan Gelak serta tiga artis jemputan sebagai pembantu. Peserta yang tidak dapat tahan dari ketawa akan didenda.(n)

programme.title: Halalkan Hati Yang Ku Curi S1
programme.desc: Nenda Delisha merancang sesuatu di pejabatnya bersama pasangan Delina dan Daud (ibu bapa Delisha) dan juga dengan ibu dan bapa Faiq. Pasangan itu akur memandangkan perniagaan masing sedang tidak baik. Sementara itu, Delisha dan Faiq mendapati ibu bapa masing tiada di rumah begitu juga nendanya. Jadi, mereka bercadang untuk keluar bercuti. Dalam bersiap untuk keluar bercuti, Salima betemu Delisha dan dia juga memaklumkan telah terlanjur dengan Zainal. Salima seterusnya memaklumkan Zainal, tujuan untuk memberitahu yang Delisha tiada lagi hati dengannya kerana dia pergi bercuti dengan Faiq. Baik pun semasa hendak keluar bercuti, sikap Delisha amat sombong dengan penjaga rumah nendanya, peminta sedekah dan pencuci bangunan. Delisha terasa tidak selesa kehadiran dua rakan Faiq. Selain dia bersikap sombong terhadap mereka, hubungannya dengan Faiq juga ada berlaku pergeseran kecil. Cuma yang menyakinkan di hati Delisha, Faiq menyatakan dengan adanya rakan-rakan, ini akan mengelak mereka dari berlaku yang tidak diingini.(n)

programme.title: Patahnya Sebelah Sayap S1
programme.desc: Amzar mengaku salah atas kesalahannya dihadapan Khuzairi yang menyebabkan kematian arwah isterinya. Alisha merasa seronok apabila kuih sejuk bekunya telah ditempah oleh Khuzairi tanpa pengetahuannya. Amzar tertekan apabila beliau dipecat dari syarikat dan pihak pengurusan tertinggi juga tahu akan kegiatan rasuahnya. Alisha terasa terkejut apabila Khuzairi sudah tahu segala perkara dan siapa pembunuh isterinya yang sebenar. Pihak polis telah mengeledah rumah Amzar serta merampas beberapa dokumen penting serta pisau, berhubung kes rasuah dan pembunuhan yang telah dilakukan olehnya. Amzar telah menculik Alisha setelah memukulnya hingga pengsan. Alisha dan Khuzairi telah bercinta semula.(n)

programme.title: Dapur Dara S2
programme.desc: Dengan bajet RM10, Shazz, tukang masak Dapur Dara akan menyediakan dua jenis hidangan masakan harian yang senang, sedap dan sihat.(n)

programme.title: J.K.K S2
programme.desc: Pak Kodi asyik marah marah hari ini. Dia bising kerana perniagaannya tak untung. Bijan memberitahu Pak Din mengenai kedatangan Bomoh Selamat itu ke kampung mereka. Sementara itu, Pak Kodi sebenarnya telah menggunakan perkhidmatan Bomoh Selamat. Bomoh Selamat meyakinkan Pak Kodi tidak lama lagi warung Pak Kodi akan dikunjungi ramai pelanggan. Kemudian, terdapat mesyuarat. Semua penduduk kampung menuduh Bomoh Selamat menipu. Pak Kodi menyuruh pulangkan balik wang nya. Setelah itu, datang seorang lelaki yang sering menjual surat khabar di kampung mereka. Dia membawa bukti pita rakaman Bomoh Selamat dan bininya menipu.(n)

Salima seterusnya memaklumkan Zainal, tujuan untuk memberitahu yang Delisha tiada lagi hati dengannya kerana dia pergi bercuti dengan Faiq. Baik pun semasa hendak keluar bercuti, sikap Delisha amat sombong dengan penjaga rumah nendanya, peminta sedekah dan pencuci bangunan. Delisha terasa tidak selesa kehadiran dua rakan Faiq.(n)

programme.title: Playboy Kantoi
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang seorang playboy, BEN, juga seorang pelakon yang sedang meningkat naik yang mana setiap dada akhbar dan di corong radio di cop sebagai playboy kerana bertukar-tukar pasangan dan bercinta lebih dari seorang dalam masa yang sama. Ramai wanita tergilakan Ben kerana kemachoan dan mulut manisnya itu.(n)

programme.title: In Person S2
programme.desc: Dalam rancangan In Person setiap episod membawa sekumpulan muzik tempatan tanah air yang berbeza dengan keunikan mereka yang tersendiri. Setiap episod menampilkan sesi temubual bersama ahli kumpulan secara mendalam dan rakaman persembahan mereka secara langsung.(n)

programme.title: Dunia Tersembunyi S3
programme.desc: Program berbentuk majalah dokumentari yang menyingkap kepelbagaian kehidupan manusia dari gaya hidup yang luar biasa, sosio-ekonomi, destinasi pelancongan hingga keunikan budaya seluruh dunia yang dipanggil sebagai norma dan bakal menghimpunkan kisah-kisah misteri dan pelik buat penonton.(n)

programme.title: Lawak Sentral S2
programme.desc: Lawak Sental adalah kompilasi sketsa – sketsa lawak santai pendek yang pasti membuat anda gelak ketawa dan terhibur.(n)

programme.title: Selipar Jepun Stileto Merah S1
programme.desc: Stila dan Leto menetap di kawasan perumahan yang sama. Namun kediaman mereka terpisah dengan sebatang jalan yang membezakan kawasan perumahan golongan kaya dengan bawahan. Tempat yang menjadi titik pertemuan mereka ialah tempat menunggu bas yang terletak diantara jalan ini. Di sini mereka sering bersua muka, tetapi tidak pernah bertegur sapa. Apakah yang berlaku seterusnya? Mampukah cinta mereka bersatu akhirnya?(n)

programme.title: Isteri Dalam Sangkar S1
programme.desc: Pergaduhan Iskandar dan Haziq semakin hebat apabila Iskandar mengungkit tentang status sebenar Haziq yang merupakan anak yatim piatu dan di bela oleh keluarga Iskandar. Hal itu membuatkan hati Haziq terluka. Dia berjanji untuk menebus semua kebaikan keluarga Iskandar dengan mengembalikan Aisyah semula ke pangkuan Iskandar. Iskandar berterus-terang dengan Tengku Maria siapa sebenarnya Aisyah. Tengku Maria terduduk kesal kerana tidak mengetahuinya dari awal. Namun Tengku Maria terguris hati apabila anak lelaki yang dibesarkannya sanggup memarahi dirinya sebagai ibu hanya disebabkan seorang wanita lain yang lebih besar cintanya berbanding Tengku Maria. Oleh kerana silap yang telah dilakukan, Tengku Maria berjanji akan memperbetulkan semula keadaan. Pertunangan antara Iskandar dan Waiduri diputuskan.(n)

programme.title: Hanya Kau Yang Satu
programme.desc: ARLISA, merupakan seorang pelajar kolej yang sedang bercinta dengan seorang lelaki bernama Nazri sejak dibangku sekolah lagi. Arlisa menyambung pengajiannya di sebuah universiti semata untuk mengejar impiannya menjadi seorang wartawan. Hubungan yang terjalin sudah menjangkau enam tahun dan hubungan mereka tidak pernah goyah dek kerana orang ketiga. Mereka saling sayang menyayangi dan sangat setia. Malangnya, Nazri seorang lelaki yang panas baran, mudah melenting dan suka memarahi Arlisa hanya disebabkan perkara yang kecil. Pun begitu, Nazri tidak menyukai impian yang sedang dibawa oleh Arlisa kerana bimbang jika Arlisa akan bermain mata dengan orang lain. Meskipun Nazri tidak pernah menyokong Arlisa namun Nazri sentiasa bersama Arlisa. Sikap melulu Nazri sememangnya tidak digemari oleh Arlisa sendiri. Puan Zalinda iaitu ibu Arlisa tidak menyukai Nazri disebabkan sikap Nazri yang tidak matang. Nazri merupakan seorang lelaki yang bekerjaya sebagai manager di syarikat bapanya. Disebabkan itu, Nazri sering merasakan bahawa tiada lelaki lain yang lebih layak untuk memiliki Arlisa selain dirinya. Pernah suatu hari, Damia iaitu rakan baik Arlisa telah berjumpa Nazri dan memarahi Nazri kerana mengkasari Arlisa, sejak itu Nazri mula naik angin setiap kali melihat Arlisa bersama Damia. Nazri merasakan Arlisa telah menceritakan hal hubungan mereka kepada orang lain. Suatu hari, kerana terlalu marah Nazri telah meninggalkan Arlisa di tepi jalan hanya disebabkan hal kecil. Walaupun sikap Nazri seperti itu Arlisa masih mampu bertahan bersama Nazri dan cuba memahami dan menerima setiap tindakan yang dilakukan Nazri. Meskipun Arlisa seorang yang tegas dan mempunyai pendirian yang tetap tetapi apabila bersama Nazri, Arlisa akan kelihatan seolah lemah. Ini kerana rasa sayang dan cinta Arlisa yang sudah tersemai lama terhadap Nazri. Sementara Nazri tetap akan memujuk Arlisa kembali dan akhirnya dengan mudah Arlisa akan memaafkan Nazri tanpa mempertikaikan sikap buruk Nazri. Puan Zalinda tidak menyenangi sikap Nazri dan sering memberi nasihat kepada Arlisa untuk membuat keputusan tentang hubungannya dengan Nazri.(n)

programme.title: Halalkan Hati Yang Ku Curi S1
programme.desc: Delisha tidak selesa dengan kehadiran rakan-rakan Faiq semasa bercuti menyebabkan Delisha ingin pulang bercuti. Rakan-rakannya merancang untuk aktiviti berlumba kereta secara haram, Delisha setuju. Sebelum memulakan aktiviti mereka dipintas polis. kedua-dua mereka ditahan. Tiba-tiba, nenda dan ibu bapa Delisha terpaksa bergegas menjamin keluar Delisha dan Faiq dari lokap. Di balai, Zainal yang menghubungi polis bertemu nenda. Zainal berhasrat nenda berterima kasih. Tetapi nenda marah-marah terus meminta Zainal beredar sahaja. Di rumah, nenda Delisha begitu marah kepada Delisha dan beranggapan Delisha berduaan semasa bercuti. Delisha menjelaskan cara dia bercuti. Nendanya tidak setuju dan rasa kesal menyelesaikan kad kredit Delisha. Kemudiannya, Delisha dan Faiq setuju mereka tidak akan bertemu sementara ini.(n)

programme.title: Mimpi Sabrina S1
programme.desc: Percintaan dua darjat antara Sabrina anak seorang hartawan dengan Fahrin, adik kepada pembantu rumah yang bekerja di villa milik keluarga Sabrina. Hubungan mereka tetap terjalin sehinggalah berkubur begitu sahaja apabila Fahrin dipenjara atas kesalahan yang dia tidak lakukan.(n)

programme.title: J.K.K S2
programme.desc: Pak Din datang ke warung Pak Kodi dan warung kelihatan sunyi. Mereka datang dari arah belakang kedai dan menyanyikan lagu happy birthday kepada Pak Din. Mereka memberikan hadiah seekor kucing kepada Pak Din. Pak Din menolak. Seterusnya, terdapat majlis pameran haiwan bersama dengan Pak Herman. Pada waktu malam, mereka semua berkumpul di dewan kerana haiwan Pak Herman yang diletakkan di dewan, terlepas. Mereka mahu tahu cara menangkap biawak Komodo itu. Ucop terbocorkan rahsia yang Bijan secara tidak sengaja telah melepaskan biawak Komodo itu. Akhirnya, Acap pembantu Pak Herman yang menjumpai biawak itu.(n)

programme.desc: Hazri amat kecewa Farhana memutuskan hubungan kerana dia telah bersedia untuk berkahwin setelah Raisya bertunang. Walaupun Farhana meminta putus tetapi dia tidak suka apabila ibunya memperkecilkan Hazri. 10 tahun dia dan Hazri bercinta dan kini dia bakal berkahwin dengan Firman. Puasla Shira, Raisya dan Azraf pujuk tetapi Hazri tetap tidak gembira. Kerana bimbang dengan hubungan Raisya dan Y, Azraf meminta Diana untk mempercepatkan perkahwinannya dengan Raisya!(n)

programme.desc: ‘Celebs Day Off’ merupakan rancangan sehari bersama selebriti akan membawa anda ke tempat makan & aktiviti menarik untuk dikunjungi. Episod kali ini menampilkan Adzrin sebagai selebriti jemputan.(n)

programme.title: Trend Setter Sr2

Tetapi niat Boss Rocky nampaknya dia tidak dapat menjalankan dengan mudah kerana tidak disangka-sangka, dia bertemu dengan lawan yang paling berat yang pernah dia temui. Penentang yang tidak mempunyai rasuah atau persuasi yang paling kuat. Orang itu adalah lelaki tangan kanan Ustad Soleh, lelaki muda yang tidak bersalah tetapi bijak bernama Kabayan.(n)

programme.title: Kad Cinta
programme.desc: TK, seorang sarjana muda pulang dari London setelah menamatkan pengajian di sana. Sebagai sebahagian daripada penyelidikannya, beliau berhenti di Istanbul untuk mengerjakan tesisnya. Di sana dia berpeluang melihat seorang gadis bernama Julia, pelajar akhir tahun sarjana dan anak perempuan Duta Besar Malaysia ke Turki, dan tahu itu cinta pada pandangan pertama baginya. Walau bagaimanapun, Amran, rakan sekelas Julia juga berminat kepadanya. Apabila Julia mula menerima hadiah secara anonim, dia mula tertanya-tanya siapa yang boleh dan hatinya tersungkur oleh peminat misterius, tanpa mengetahui bahawa ia sebenarnya dari TK. Siapa yang akan memilih Julia pada akhirnya? Atau cemburu akan menyebabkan darah yang buruk?(n)

programme.title: Kara King
programme.desc: Wu memenangi Kejohanan Karaoke Serantau di Hong Kong dengan kos kehilangan sahabatnya, Gao. Apabila minat cinta Gao Ah Hu menerima cadangan perkahwinan Wu, persaingan antara kedua-dua juara Karaoke itu menjadi persaingan seumur hidup. Tetapi semasa puncak karier nyanyiannya, Wu tiba-tiba memutuskan untuk melepaskan semua kemasyhuran dan kekayaan dan hilang dari Hong Kong bersama dua anaknya. Hanya apabila Wu fikir dia boleh mengambil semua rahsia dengannya ke kuburnya, Gao mendapati dia dan datang untuk membinasakan di Kampung Kara. Dengan berita tentang isterinya yang lama yang dipertaruhkan, Wu dipaksa keluar dari persaraan untuk satu pertarungan terakhir antara dua juara Karaoke.(n)

programme.desc: 3xtraOrdinary Love adalah rancangan aneka ragam yang dihoskan oleh pelbagai pengacara dan artis tempatan. Setiap episod akan ada tetamu khas untuk disertainya. Mereka akan berbincang isu terkini dan bermain permainan yang telah disediakan untuk mereka.(n)

programme.title: LIDA 2020
programme.desc: Bersama 70 penyanyi dangdut yang berbakat dari pelbagai tempat di Indonesia, masing-masing akan bersaing dan menampilkan persembahan dangdut terbaik mereka. Tonton persembahan dangdut yang menakjubkan dari para peserta yang berusaha sebaik mungkin untuk menjadi pemenang seterusnya.(n)

programme.title: Kamera Cinta
programme.desc: Kamera Cinta adalah adaptasi format antarabangsa dari "Hear Me Love Me See Me\.(n)

programme.title: Tastymony
programme.desc: Satu program makanan Indonesia yang mengajak para penonton ke pelbagai tempat yang menarik untuk mencuba makanan yang unik dan lazat dari berbagai daerah di Indonesia yang unik dan pasti rasa enak.(n)

programme.title: Dari Security Bidadari Jatuh Ke Hati
programme.desc: Nina secara tidak sengaja melemparkan tonfa ke arah seorang lelaki bernama Dion, Nina menganggap Dion adalah pencuri yang dikejarnya. Sejak itu Dion berdendam terhadap Nina, tetapi tidak berhenti di situ. Ketika hendak pulang ke kampung halamannya, Dio bertemu semula dengan Nina yang sedang tunggu untuk menumpang. Nina, yang sedar memanfaatkan masa itu, dan bersembunyi dengan Dion. Jadi, adakah kesal Dion memudar kerana kebaikan dan kecantikan Nina dan berubah menjadi cinta?(n)

programme.title: Anak Langit
programme.desc: Kisah tiga anak yatim yang tinggal di rumah anak yatim yang sama dan membesar bersama sebagai kawan karib. Ini adalah cerita yang indah dan menarik tentang kehidupan, cinta dan minat mereka dalam motosikal. Ianya juga adalah salah satu siri tertinggi dan paling popular di Indonesia.(n)

programme.desc: D’Star adalah pertandingan nyanyian berprestij menampilkan 30 penyanyi yang akan bertanding menjadi bintang antara semua bintang. Penyanyi-penyanyi ini berasal dari D'Academy, D'Academy Celebrity, Indonesian Dangdut League, Bintang Pantura akan membawakan pelbagai genre muzik dan menunjukkan kebolehan mereka di sini.(n)

programme.title: Joker
programme.desc: Joker (Jebakan Yang Tertuker) adalah rancangan realiti baru dimana pengacara menawarkan pertolongan kepada artis untuk 'prank' orang lain, sehingga sasarannya berasa jengkel. Rancangan realiti baru bersama kamera yang tersembunyi merakam aksi dan reaksi spontan mereka yang dihoskan oleh John Martin Tumbel dan Lionil Hendrik yang turut merupakan pengacara rancangan Tercyduk.(n)

programme.title: Jleb
programme.desc: Jleb! (Jebakan Seleb) adalah rancangan realiti yang berkonsepkan 'prank', dimana artis itu membuat 'prank' kepada artis lain. Jangan lepaskan keseronokan menyaksikan reaksi artis yang tiada esudahan ketika mereka saling 'prank' sesama sendiri oleh Joe Richard dan pasukan Jleb.(n)

programme.title: Hitman: Agent Jun
programme.desc: While under the influence of alcohol, an unsuccessful comic book writer draws a comic about his life as a former NIS hitman, and runs into trouble when it gets posted online.(n)

programme.title: Shadows In The Palace
programme.desc: During the Chosun period, a court lady's death was determined to be a suicide. But when a palace physician discovers that foul play was involved, she sets out to uncover the truth.(n)

programme.title: The Divine Fury
programme.desc: After waking up with mysterious wounds on his hands, a champion fighter finds himself in an otherworldly battle against evil forces that wreak havoc in the human world.(n)

programme.title: Athena: Goddess Of War
programme.desc: Set in the same murky world as IRIS, a new group of agents must face off against terrorists and untangle a dangerous conspiracy threatening national security.(n)

programme.title: Love, Lies
programme.desc: A gisaeng is consumed by jealousy after her friend finds success as a pop singer and her lover falls for her. Feeling betrayed, things begin to fall apart as she tries to regain the things she lost.(n)

programme.title: Midnight Runners
programme.desc: Two students from Korean National Police University decide to work together and track down a kidnapping incident.(n)

programme.title: Voice Of Silence
programme.desc: Two guys make a living by cleaning up crime scenes were asked to take care of a kidnapped girl by their superior. As their superior were killed, the duo are clueless on what to do with the girl...(n)

programme.title: Golden Slumber
programme.desc: A delivery man finds himself entwined in a dangerous conspiracy when he is accused of assassinating a presidential candidate. To stay alive, he must uncover the truth and clear his name.(n)

programme.title: The Accidental Detective
programme.desc: A crime-enthusiast blogger and a veteran detective team up to prove the innocence of their mutual friend who's been framed for a horrific murder.(n)

programme.title: Possessed
programme.desc: Hee-jin returns home from college to find her missing sister. During the investigation, she hears that her sister had been possessed and her neighbors who knew her sister begin dying one by one….(n)

programme.title: The Map Against The World
programme.desc: After his father dies due to an erroneous map, Kim Jeong-Ho sets out to make an accurate map of Joseon.(n)

programme.title: Love, Lies
programme.desc: A gisaeng is consumed by jealousy after her friend finds success as a pop singer and her lover falls for her. Feeling betrayed, things begin to fall apart as she tries to regain the things she lost.(n)

programme.title: My Paparotti
programme.desc: Music teacher Sang-Jin was given a task to train Jang-Ho, a teenage gangster talented in singing and dreamed of being a world-class singer. Yet conflict arises between two local gangs and Jang-ho was forced into a difficult situation...(n)

programme.title: The Classic
programme.desc: Ji-hae writes a love letter for her friend to a boy they both have a crush on. As the boy falls in love with her letters, she discovers that her mother also had a similar romance in the past.(n)

programme.title: Jazzy Misfits
programme.desc: A jazz singer goes on a day trip with her estranged mother in search of her younger sister who disappeared with their money. As the two roam around in Seoul, they start to discover a different side to each other that they had never seen.(n)

programme.title: Man In Love
programme.desc: Tae-Il lives a fast life as low level thug. When he learns that he has a terminal illness without much time left to live, he falls in love for the first time.(n)

programme.title: Heung-Boo: The Revolutionist
programme.desc: Set in the Joseon dynasty, a satirical street play becomes popular among the people. Heung-boo, its author, gains fame and is sought by conflicting powers who want to use him for their own agendas.(n)

programme.title: The King's Case Note
programme.desc: A clever King and his brilliant chronicle keeper hunt for the truth behind a crime that threatens the throne and the stability of the country.(n)

programme.title: Masquerade
programme.desc: The story of the bizarre King Hwanghae and a look-a-like peasant, who stands in for the monarch when the King faces the threat of assassination.(n)

programme.title: Beautiful Vampire
programme.desc: 500-year-old vampire Ran survives by animal blood instead of human blood. She runs a make-up shop and tries to live like a human. As she met her landlord's son and fall in love with him, his scent awaken her thirst to human blood...(n)

programme.title: Love+Sling
programme.desc: Despite having zero interest in the sport, Sung-woong trains to become a top wrestler with his dad's enthusiastic support. When the girl he likes falls for his dad, they begin wrestling for love.(n)

programme.title: A Bittersweet Life
programme.desc: A mob enforcer, sent to murder his boss’ mistress, finds himself falling for the woman while investigating her affair with a rival gangster.(n)

programme.title: Golden Slumber
programme.desc: A delivery man finds himself entwined in a dangerous conspiracy when he is accused of assassinating a presidential candidate. To stay alive, he must uncover the truth and clear his name.(n)

programme.title: Steel Rain: Summit
programme.desc: A peace summit for Korea is derailed when the leaders of South Korea, North Korea and the U.S. are abducted by North Korean hardliners and held hostage in a submarine.(n)

programme.title: Bank Attack
programme.desc: Desperate for money to save his sick daughters life, a father decides to rob a bank. Things become much more complicated, when real bank robbers enter the bank.(n)

programme.title: The Map Against The World
programme.desc: After his father dies due to an erroneous map, Kim Jeong-Ho sets out to make an accurate map of Joseon.(n)

programme.title: Singles
programme.desc: Three best friends shares the ups and downs of their turbulent single lives together. But when two of them end up in bed together, their friendship is tested.(n)

programme.title: Midnight Runners
programme.desc: Two students from Korean National Police University decide to work together and track down a kidnapping incident.(n)

programme.title: Door Lock
programme.desc: A woman, living by herself, finds her door lock cover left open one day. Startled by this, she starts investigating on her own and finds more hints of someone trying to enter her home.(n)

programme.title: Athena: Goddess Of War
programme.desc: Set in the same murky world as IRIS, a new group of agents must face off against terrorists and untangle a dangerous conspiracy threatening national security.(n)

programme.title: The Odd Family: Zombie On Sale
programme.desc: When a pharmaceutical company's illegal experiments inadvertently create a zombie, the quirky Park family discovers an interesting side effect to the virus and tries to profit from it.(n)

programme.desc: Cha Seung-won and Yoo Hae-jin return to Manjae island for 3 Meals A Day-Fishing village 2 with more guests visiting, including Son Ho-Joon from last season!(n)

programme.title: The Devil Judge
programme.desc: Set in dystopian Korea where the entire nation participates in live court trials, is the notorious “Devil Judge” Kang Yohan a hero or a devil wearing the mask of the law?(n)

programme.title: Honeymoon Tavern

programme.title: City Squeeze
programme.desc: James Wong lusts for Elizabeth Lee but remains faithful to wife Lydia Shum, despite his efforts and the help of Kenny Bee.(n)

programme.title: Mr. Vampire
programme.desc: Classic Hong Kong vampire comedy about Taoist priests who inadvertently turn a corpse into a murderous zombie. The planned reburial of a village elder goes awry as the corpse resurrects into a hopping, bloodthirsty vampire, threatening mankind. Therefore, a Taoist Priest and his two disciples attempt to stop the terror.(n)

programme.title: The Private Eyes
programme.desc: A small detective agency and the problems it has staying in business and out of trouble; but essentially it is a social comedy and a very penetrating comment on the human condition.(n)

programme.title: Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: In World War II Shanghai, Tony Leung is torn between his duty to China and his love for nightclub singer Anita Mui.(n)

programme.title: Fractured Follies
programme.desc: Chow Yun-Fat is Joe, an aimless taxi driver who hits May (Joey Wong), a sweet girl who’s afflicted with a rare problem. It seems one of her legs is one inch longer than the other. In sympathy, Joe decides to help May's family and their new grocery store, which is a run-down work-in-progress. Love blooms along the way, a plot development that’s helped by the always good chemistry between Chow Yun-Fat and Joey Wong.(n)

programme.title: The Wild Ones
programme.desc: Social worker Olivia Cheng attempts to tame 4 of Hong Kong's wildest reform schoolgirls, including Irene Wan and Loletta Lee.(n)

programme.title: Looking for Mister Perfect
programme.desc: At a Malaysian resort, policewoman Shu Qi sets her sights on secret agent Andy On, hot on the trail of villain Simon Yam.(n)

programme.title: Devoted To You
programme.desc: Coming-of-age drama about the psychological changes of May Lo and Loletta Lee when they encounter Jacky Cheung and Michael Wong.(n)

programme.title: Second Time Around
programme.desc: Las Vegas gambler Ekin Cheng's life is changed thanks to parallel universes and the help of police officer Cecilia Cheung.(n)

programme.title: Will Of Iron
programme.desc: Maggie returns Hong Kong to accompany her grandmother to Canada. She also takes this opportunity to visit her old friends, Carol \& Jacky. Little does she know that Jacky has become a drug addict. More surprising, the drug dealer is Maggie's boy-friend, Michael.(n)

programme.title: My Date with a Vampire S1
programme.desc: Fat Hoi's kung fu badly injures Ling and Zheng Zhong. Tin Yau turns into a vampire saving them. He defeats Fat Hoi with Yamamoto.Yet, Sou intercedes for Fat Hoi. Sang was forced to suck human blood which breaks his vow.(n)

programme.title: Troublesome Night 2
programme.desc: It is a sequel to the original Troublesome Night. Using the popular "three horror stories" structure, this new installment features the same stars as the first Troublesome Night in all-new situations. Simon Lui, Louis Koo, and Allen Ting are three DJs who undergo lots of haunting when various nasty events happen in their lives making them spiritual targets.(n)

programme.title: From Riches to Rags
programme.desc: Ricky and Fatso are friends in need. They are in dire need of money since they are only paid slave wages at the bottling factory. However, they become millionaires overnight after buying a winning lottery ticket. During one of their swingin' nights on the town, Ricky is suddenly attacked by an upset stomach; and in no time, a quack doctor diagnoses the seizure as terminal cancer. Ricky seriously considers suicide. But he is appalled by the drawbacks inherent in the available methods of doing himself in--primarily the pain! It is on a rooftop from which he is supposed to make a plunge that he saves a poor man from suicide by giving the latter all the money he has. In gratitude, the newly rich man promises to hire a killer to finish off his suffering benefactor...(n)

programme.title: Love Unto Wastes
programme.desc: Chow is assigned to investigate a murder case. He discovers the complicated relationship among 4 suspects. And then something happens to him.(n)

programme.title: Prison on Fire
programme.desc: The plot mostly involves the two main characters, Ching and Yiu and problems they face with Mickey, a fellow inmate and "Scarface\.(n)

programme.title: Chase A Fortune
programme.desc: Script written by Wong Kar Wai. Sport reporter Xiang is hurted by the King Boxer while trying to interview him. As advice by his cousin, Xiang pretends to be handicap in order to get compensation from insurance company.(n)

programme.title: She Shoots Straight
programme.desc: She Shoots Straight turns on three satisfying plot axes. The first concerns the complications of a workplace romance and marriage between a dedicated policewoman “Mina Kao” and her supervisor “Huang Tsung-pao”. The second theme concerns opposition by the Huang family to the couple’s impending union. Another policewoman, Mina’s future sister-in-law “Chia-ling” is especially critical of apparent favoritism, and even makes a remark about her being Eurasian.(n)

programme.title: Cop of the town
programme.desc: Ricky and Romeo are both veterans working in an elite police squad but cannot work well with new female inspector. One day, Annie, a model, complains of being harassed by her former friend, Ricky. Romeo, who likes to flirt with pretty girls, takes up the case. It leads to a various serious confrontation between Ricky and Romeo. When matters become critical, Ricky shows his crazy and cunning side. Psychotic and thirsting for revenge, who knows what Ricky may do?(n)

programme.title: Ghost Fever
programme.desc: A married businessman's ill-advised dalliance with a mysterious beauty comes back to haunt him--literally--when it turns out his bedmate is one of a family of ghosts, who visit revenge upon his family and possess him. Unusually grim material for screenwriter/star Wong Jing.(n)

programme.title: Project A
programme.desc: Set in early 1900's China, Project A involves the government's Marine Forces failed attempts to stopping a band of pirate-smugglers led by the evil Lo. After being forced to resign, Dragon Ma becomes frustrated over the Marines' inability to protect the innocent from the pirates. Determined to stop them himself, he teams up with an old buddy and a former rival.(n)

programme.title: Chocolate Inspector
programme.desc: Inspector Chocolate serves the Special Crime Squad for a long time but lack of achievement. One day, Superintendent Chao assigns his daughter Anita to Chocolate's team for a mysterious missing child case.(n)

programme.title: Final Justice (1988)
programme.desc: Cheung Tit Chu was a senior Inspector of Special Crime Investigation Department in the Police Force. Cheung likes to make decisions and execute duties independently. Though this was not pretty approved by the authority. Cheung's smart and courage still enabled him to be the best crime fighter within the region. However, Cheung's brilliant character brought him into conflicts with his new superior, David Law and his work was always hindered by the latter...(n)

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow II
programme.desc: John Woo returned to direct the film, and once again stars Chow Yun Fat, this time as the twin brother of the character he played in the first film. The sequel sees Tse-ho working together with brother Tse-kit to help the police break a counterfeit syndicate. They discover Lung is in danger of being killed by his employee, Ko, who is masterminding the counterfeit operations.(n)

programme.title: Love for all Seasons
programme.desc: Millionaire Tiger Hung (Louis Koo) is told to find cure at the mysterious all-women martial arts sect Omei, and there he meets Omei's young master May (Sammi Cheng). The healing process moves smoothly until May's big sister Misery (Li Bing-Bing) shows up and challenges May into a duel. Misery has lost her mind and she threatens to destroy Omei unless May beats her with the sect's long-lost “Heartbreak Sword Technique"...(n)

programme.title: Royal Tramp
programme.desc: The story of Wai Siu Bo, a lecherous wimp who after saving Chan, the leader of the Heaven and Earth society, a revolutionary group, is made a member. After a botched first assignment for the group, he is made a servant to the Emperor, the very person the Heaven and Earth society wants to overthrow. What follows is plenty of mayhem and laughter. But it ends with the exposure and escape of the fake Empress Dowager.(n)

programme.title: Royal Tramp II
programme.desc: Following on from the Royal Tramp I, after discovering that the Empress is actually Lone-er, a member of the St Dragon Sect, and that she imprisoned the real empress. Lone-er is bent on eliminating the person who disclosed her true identity, Wilson Bond. But more complications ensues when Lone-er is assigned to protect the Prince, whose servant is none other than Wilson Bond.(n)

programme.title: Goodbye Darling
programme.desc: Tai (Raymond Wong), a loving and caring husband and Josephine (Cherrie Chung), his sweet and darling wife, are a young, merry couple. Tai has a close lawyer friend, funny but kind-hearted Choi Sum (John Sum) who often offers his help whenever Tai needs it. Tai works in a De Luxe hotel's top management. He brings his wife to the hotel's annual ball in which all his colleagues are fascinated by the beauty of Josephine. Among the colleagues, there is a notorious seducer who is execptionally keen in seducing the wives of his friends. Tai, with the help of Choi Sum, makes every effort to protect his wife. They bring themselves into a series of hilarious and comic situations. Due to a complicated misunderstanding, Tai learns that he has got an incurabl cancer...(n)

programme.title: Market Romance
programme.desc: Happy-go-lucky Sister Kot is the owner of a fish market who adores pop singer Alex. Her Secret admirer is Keung, a frequent customer. When Keung discovers that Alex may actually be his lost brother….(n)

programme.title: In The Line Of Duty III
programme.desc: Special Duties Unit officer Cynthia Khan joins forces with Japanese agents to track down murderous Red Army terrorists.(n)

programme.title: The Return of Pom Pom
programme.desc: Two detectives and best buddies investigate how the inspector is framed by a master thief. Accidentally they meet the thief's daughter.(n)

programme.title: Vampire Vs. Vampire
programme.desc: Lam Ching Ying discovers that the water supply in his village has been contaminated by bats and, while in the process of digging a well to find new water supply, he inadvertently unearths the corpse of an evil priest. While already dealing with a horde of creatures including a mischievous kid vampire, a lusty female ghost, and the spirit of a murdered prostitute, the corpse resurrects into a vampire.(n)

programme.title: Where's Officer Tuba?
programme.desc: Officer Tuba and Police Detective Chow attempt to hunt down a band of blackmailers. Unsuccessful in capturing the gang, Chow is gunned down and, in his dying moment, makes Tuba promise that he will defeat the gangsters and avenge his death. When Tuba goes on another police mission with rookie Cheung and tries to woo his girlfriend-to-be Joanne, he forgets his promise to Chow.(n)

programme.title: The Great Pretenders
programme.desc: Taiwanese swindler Mr. Giant (Teddy Robin) loses in a poker match against Hong Kong swindler Wong Seung-chin (Raymond Wong) and had become sworn enemies. Meanwhile, Wong's apprentice Snake Wai (Tony Leung) meets Susan (Lok Wai), a widow whom recently returned to Hong Kong from Singapore. Planning to con a big sum of money from her, Wai sets up a plan with his acquaintances Yam Sai-sung (Simon Yam) and Yip Mei-mei (Amy Yip).(n)

programme.title: Itchy Heart
programme.desc: Poon has been living a humdrum life since he married Cheung seven years ago. Cheung decides to go for a trip on her own, leaving behind Poon in Hong Kong. Poon seizes this golden chance to plunge himself into some romantic adventures. He runs into alluring, passionate Cherry and begins to woo her. Afterwards, he even meets his first love Bing who becomes a successful career woman. Finally the passion is ignited!(n)

programme.title: Swordsman
programme.desc: 'Sunflower Scripture' is suddenly stolen from the Forbidden City! In order to avoid any scandal, head eunuch Koo Jin-foo appoints Cho Leng-tsan to investigate.(n)

programme.title: A Chinese Ghost Story II
programme.desc: Following the events of A Chinese Ghost Story, Ling Choi Sin returns to his hometown and, while fleeing from cannibals, gets himself imprisoned. With the help of his cell mate, scholar Elder Chu, Sin escapes and then finds himself crossing paths with rebel sisters Moon and Windy, who bears a strong resemblance to his beloved tragic ghost, Lip Siu Sin.(n)

programme.title: Heart of Dragon
programme.desc: Jackie Chan plays a cop sacrificing his dreams to care for his retarded brother whose simplicity renders him an unsuspecting victim of a kidnapping. Golden Harvest had wanted Hung to perform fight scenes in the film, but he refused, rationalising "My character was mentally retarded, mentally disabled, so how can you ask me to fall down and suddenly become well again? And fight?(n)

programme.title: Haunted Office
programme.desc: Investor firm employee Pat overhear a group of girls talk about the haunting that takes place each year in their office high-rise, which leads to the deaths of nine people every time.(n)

programme.title: Crazy Romance
programme.desc: A star-studded comedy about an odd couple. The man is a kind-hearted small-time thief, while the woman is an imperious prison officer.(n)

programme.title: All The Wrong Spies
programme.desc: Private eye Yoyo enlists help from Inspector Robin to obtain a secret formula for an important weapon in war time China under Japanese attack.(n)

programme.title: Lucid Dreams
programme.desc: An episodic film which the director recounts four of his own dreams: Don wants to repay his debt by arranging a fake wedding; Fan, a white collar, learns to let go of his ego after...(n)

programme.title: Royal Tramp
programme.desc: The story of Wai Siu Bo, a lecherous wimp who after saving Chan, the leader of the Heaven and Earth society, a revolutionary group, is made a member. After a botched first assignment for the group, he is made a servant to the Emperor, the very person the Heaven and Earth society wants to overthrow. What follows is plenty of mayhem and laughter. But it ends with the exposure and escape of the fake Empress Dowager.(n)

programme.title: The Leakers
programme.desc: After mutated Zika epidemic happens in Malaysia, illegal hacker group 'The Leakers' network with Hong Kong police David tries to disclose pharmaceutical company AMANAH Malaysia's conspiracy and crimes.(n)

programme.title: Romance D Latte
programme.desc: Kawaii Cheung grows up in a Christian orphanage, and she is determined to reciprocate the kindness she has received and dedicates herself to serve the orphanage. She works as the assistant to Pastor Wu, the orphanage warden.(n)

programme.title: 2 Idiots
programme.desc: Accidently hired by a private investigation firm, two young men are sent on a mission of collecting debt. When they finally get a 10-million-dollar check from the director of an orphanage, they find that they don't feel happy at all. A battle between their real personalities and the harsh reality begins...(n)

programme.title: Money Not Enough 2
programme.desc: The story revolves around three brothers from a middle-income background in contemporary Singapore. These are characters who are representative of the business owners, white and blue collar workers of Singaporeans….(n)

programme.title: King of Mahjong
programme.desc: Fatt and Tin Ba are both former students of legendary mahjong master Ru, but their lives couldn't have turned out more differently. Fatt is a stuffed tofu vendor operating out of a dilapidated coffee shop. Tin Ba is a ten-time mahjong world champion and has all the wealth and glory that come with that title. One day, Tin Ba drops by Fatt's coffee shop and throws down the gauntlet, challenging his erstwhile friend to a mahjong battle...(n)

programme.title: The Last Thieves
programme.desc: Young entrepreneur Yin Tzu-hsiang and his partners dream to change the unreasonable structure of the current economy with blockchain. Yin meets Hsu Ching, realising that if he has to change himself first.(n)

programme.title: GUANG
programme.desc: A spark of childhood inspiration causes an autistic man to embark on a quest to collect delicate items. Little does he know that his quest of building a delicate item would unlock the answers to his life and change everything.(n)

programme.title: Keep Calm and be a Superstar
programme.desc: ZHU from China, as a huge fan of Hong Kong cinema, has always dream of become a cop like in the movies, who unfortunately failed the fitness exam in China's Police Force selection because of asthma.(n)

programme.title: Hooked on You
programme.desc: Miu runs one of the fish stalls at the Fortune Market along with her gambling addict father. A feud with rival vendor Fishman will turn into friendship plus feelings of more as they two move through history between 1997 to 2007...(n)

programme.title: A World Without Thieves
programme.desc: A con-team couple head west after taking a city businessman for his BMW. But an encounter with a naive young carpenter travelling home with his life savings challenges their fate as thieves.(n)

programme.title: For Your Heart Only
programme.desc: Be wild & disobedient, Disc Jockey Chan Fok Shui was hardly accepted by Yu Lai Chun. Chan stopped his friend Shapy from approaching his little sister. One day, Chan recognized Yu was the one he loved most in his life.(n)

programme.title: Set To Kill
programme.desc: In this taut suspense thriller directed by Marco Mak (COP ON A MISSION, SLIM Till DEAD), bank investors Billy and Connie need to locate the missing $200 million protect Connie, one of whom happens to be Connie's ex-lover Nick.(n)

programme.title: The Accidental Spy
programme.desc: Bei, a salesman at a workout equipment store, harbors dreams of adventures. One day, Bei follows his instincts to trail two suspicious looking men into an alley. When he realizes that these men are robbing a jewelry store, he jumps into action to foil their plans. Soon after Bei meets Liu, a private investigator who convinces Bei that he may be the long-lost son of a rich Korean businessman.(n)

programme.title: Jump Ashin!
programme.desc: Ashin, our hero, grew up in Yilan County during the 1980s; he is the elder of two sons raised by a single mother. As a child, Ashin's natural agility drew him to start practicing with the school's gymnastics team. Yet his mother increasingly expected him to be more involved in the family fruit stand business, and quit gymnastics.(n)

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 2020
programme.desc: The Yau brothers team up with fellow con artists the Lui sisters to scam an infamous mob boss.(n)

programme.title: Tomorrow is Another Day
programme.desc: Wong Kam Fa is a middle-aged housewife whose life revolves around her 20-year-old autistic son. After learning that her husband is having an affair, she plots to take revenge on the mistress….(n)

programme.title: Love Matters
programme.desc: Love Matters revolves around three main protagonists – 52-year-old Tan Bo Seng, his 17-year-old son Benny and 36-year-old Jeremy Tan, Bo Seng’s ‘adopted’ brother – and their accidental journey in seeking and keeping love and happiness. Bo Seng leads a routine life. Jeremy lives a colorful life, colorful in reference to his long list of girlfriends. Benny has just school life….(n)

programme.title: Ip Man
programme.desc: During the Japanese invasion of 1937, when a wealthy martial artist is forced to leave his home and work to support his family, he reluctantly agrees to train others in the art of Wing Chun for self-defense.(n)

programme.title: The Menu
programme.desc: Following the events of the TV drama, Fong Ying has been promoted to interim chief editor and now has to deal with pressure from above to attract more online views and to beat out an unscrupulous media rival. Meanwhile, at a local TV station, Tam sets off a bomb, takes the TV crew and talk show guest hostage, and demands a meeting with the Chief Executive. Photographer Mallory and headstrong reporter Fai rush to the scene to jostle for coverage.(n)

programme.title: My Missing Valentine
programme.desc: Hsiao-chi is a young woman who always rushes and gets things done quickly. Every day, Hsiao-chi repeats the same work at the counter in the post office. Amongst all sorts of customers who Hsiao-chi has to deal with is a bus driver called Tai; Tai is as slow as a sloth and comes to Hsiao-chi in the post office to send a letter by ordinary delivery every day...(n)

programme.title: Do You Love Me as I Love You
programme.desc: Tien Xiao-Xiang is a fan of author Si-Yi and Tarot cards. But deep down, she has another love, childhood sweetheart Li Zhu-Hao. Just when she sees the perfect opportunity to reveal her love to him from fortunetelling, Li Zhu-Hao confesses his feelings to her best friend Song Yi-Jing!(n)

programme.title: Sky Hunter
programme.desc: Several Air Force pilots are given a sudden test to be selected into a secret Air Force base called the Sky Hunter. Wu Di and Ling Weifeng pass the test while Hao Chen gets eliminated.(n)

programme.title: Police Story 3 Super Cop
programme.desc: A Hong Kong detective teams up with his female Red Chinese counterpart to stop a Chinese drug czar.(n)

programme.title: Sting Of The Scorpion
programme.desc: Maggie, Anthony Wong, and Lester Chan star as three childhood friends and recent graduates of the Hong Kong police academy who find themselves assigned to the same precinct. Both men have feelings for their female colleague, but Maggie only has eyes for Anthony.(n)

programme.title: Nightmares in Precinct 7
programme.desc: After a failed operation that leaves several cops dead or wounded Officer Fong Jing wakes up at the hospital and discovers that he can see ghosts.(n)

programme.title: The Ark of Mr. Chow
programme.desc: A group of bright teenagers are recruited for a special college program for young geniuses only to find themselves socially awkward among their more normal peers.(n)

programme.title: Go LaLa Go 2
programme.desc: Five years after the first Go Lala Go, a new cast (Ariel Lin, Vic Chou, Wilson Chen, After School's Nana) breathes new life into the oft-adapted story of a modern woman who must learn to balance work, life and love. Lala starts a new career in a new position after company restructures. She encounters a handsome and successful client, Chen Feng, who proposed to Lala, and broke up with Wang Wei. Lala is in a dilemma between love and career.(n)

programme.title: Brotherhood of Blades
programme.desc: Set in the final years of the Ming Dynasty, Brotherhood of Blades stars Chang Chen, Wang Qian Yun and Ethan Li as three members of the secret military police tasked by the emperor to hunt down the powerful eunuch who runs another branch of the secret imperial police. However, the three men's loyalties are sorely tested when one of them makes a choice that would embroil them into a dangerous conspiracy.(n)

programme.title: Your Love Song
programme.desc: Music teacher Yu Jing was betrayed by her fiance, and wandered to Hualien in order to heal; while the wandering teacher Xing Zhiyuan was transferred to a local school, he used the singing competition as a springboard for his career. The student who was born with a good singing voice, Li Dongshuo and his Ma Jis, formed the band called "July Boys\.(n)

programme.title: Tag Along 2
programme.desc: Social worker Li Shu-fen is often overwhelmed by her heavy workload and neglects her daughter Li Ya-ting as a result. When she discovers that Ya-ting is gone missing, she realizes there is a past demon hidden at the bottom of her heart.(n)

programme.title: Hail the Judge
programme.desc: In a wedding banquet, a son of the Chief Commander was attracted by the beautiful bride. He attempted to rape her but failed. Chau Wah-sing, a muddleheaded minor government official, wanted to prove her innocence.(n)

programme.title: Turn Around
programme.desc: A university graduate, Wang Cheng-chung, had an internship in a rural primary school. He was prepared to leave after that but met with the Taiwan 921 earthquake. Things changed.(n)

programme.title: P Storm
programme.desc: William Luk, goes undercover as a prisoner to investigate correctional officers who are receiving bribes.(n)

programme.title: I WeirDo
programme.desc: Po-ching is an OCD patient and his quirkiness makes people regard him as a weirdo. One day, he meets another weirdo Chen Ching. It's fate that brings them together. Their relationship is spotless and perfect...(n)

programme.title: Mr. Unbelievable
programme.desc: Eric Kwek Hock Seng, born on the same day as Singapore (August 9, 1965), is abandoned as a baby in a basket with a broccoli, and is taken in by Master Lo Man. Lo Man trains Eric to perform in the getai industry, although his looks has caused setbacks. Through the years, he becomes one who is a patriotic Singaporean...(n)

programme.desc: To keep his promise, He Yan decides to take risk - possibly at the expense of his life. He is going to receive a experimental surgery which is exclusively available abroad.(n)

programme.title: iWalker-West Eyes to the East (M)
programme.desc: "iWalker - West Eyes to the East" followed the host, Rifat who is a foreigner that traveled abroad, leading the audience to experience Taiwan, which has never been seen before.(n)

programme.title: Taste of Life(T)
programme.desc: Ep.147, 148 - Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change…\nChin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened.\nChu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!(n)

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (H)
programme.desc: Ep.4167, 4168 - The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.(n)

programme.title: Hot Door Night(M)
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.(n)

programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.(n)

programme.title: The Borderless World(M)
programme.desc: There is no border and distance between countries and people. From the trend of globalization, the role played by Taiwan is clearly found. The program has already traveled to Canada, the Czech Republic, Poland, Turkey, Hungary, Romania, Iceland, etc., and also see how Taiwanese are showing competitiveness in the international arena. Taiwan’s computer’s brand like ASUS and Acer are setting their sales markets in Poland. Almost all computer components in Poland are OEMs in Taiwan. In other words, the high development of the computer industry in Poland is also part of the contribution from Taiwan! “The Borderless World” won 'International News Report Award' in the 8th Excellence Journalism Awards. In this fast-changing world, vowed to bring the latest and most comprehensive coverage for the audience. In the past two years, the team has interview the people from all around the world, to see the education level in India, the realistic and materialistic in Russia, the enthusiasm of Brazil, and the preparations to introduce the South African World Cup. The program also introduces the floating house in Dutch, the use of water in Iguazu falls, as well as the low-carbon environment in the UK, and the lively life in Sweden, bringing you the most relevant International news.(n)

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) (Repeat)
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.(n)

programme.title: Memory Love(M)
programme.desc: Ep.12, 13 - Can one life and two hearts be saved? Qiao Jia En and her boyfriend, Wang Xiu Kai, return to Taiwan from overseas to reunite with her estranged wealthy father. But when the couple gets into a car accident, Jia En suffers a concussion and memory loss while Shu Kai becomes brain dead. Jia En’s friend, Zhao Ai Li, takes advantage of the situation and takes Jia En’s place in meeting with Jia En’s father and assumes her place in a privileged life. Meanwhile, when pastry chef Xing Shao Tian collapses at a banquet, he needs an immediate heart transplant and ends up receiving Shu Kai’s heart. When Shao Tian fatefully meets Jia En, he is drawn to her. So is Shao Tian’s half-brother, Duan Ruo Fan. Can Shao Tian help Jia En regain her memory and her rightful place in life?(n)

programme.title: iWalker -Moving Kitchen (M)
programme.desc: Tuesday "iWalker" has been upgraded and changed the name into "iWalker-Moving Kitchen". James and the pretty chef, Rachel will move to different province with the mobile kitchen which costs more than 2 million NTD, and introduce to the audience the unique taste of the province.(n)

programme.title: Taste of Life(T)
programme.desc: Ep.153, 154 - Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change…\nChin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened.\nChu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!(n)

programme.title: Pyaar Impossible
programme.desc: A romantic comedy in which a geek and the most sought-after college beauty are paired together by a twist of fate. And under all odds, an impossible love story begins.(n)

programme.title: Shuddh Desi Romance
programme.desc: Story of the current generation of young boys and girls who stay away from home, date and almost get married and then there are those who run away from their marriage.(n)

programme.title: Ta Ra Rum Pum
programme.desc: A heartwarming story of a race car driver and his family whose dreams are short lived as their lives change from one extreme to the other.(n)

programme.title: Dilwale
programme.desc: A couple in love try to overcome the violent conflict between their respective families.(n)

programme.title: Aakhri Baazi
programme.desc: When his friend is killed whilst trying to arrest an underworld don, Ram Kumar sets out to avenge his death but gets involved in a plot much more sinister than he ever imagined.(n)

programme.title: Batla House
programme.desc: Following a deadly encounter with terrorists at Batla House in Delhi, Sanjeev Kumar Yadav strives to catch the culprits while dealing with nationwide criticism and post-traumatic stress disorder.(n)

programme.title: Jalebi
programme.desc: Aisha, a young woman, falls in love with Dev, a local guide of Delhi and marries him. Things start to fall apart when Aisha becomes hesitant about her pregnancy.(n)

programme.title: Bewakoofiyaan
programme.desc: Mohit a marketing whiz kid and Mayera, the financial brain with a penchant for shoes, are a couple in love but lacking money. Can you survive on just love and fresh air? (2014).(n)

programme.title: Mubarakan
programme.desc: Identical twin brothers turn to their eccentric uncle for help to make sure that they each marry the woman they love.(n)

programme.title: Bunty Aur Babli
programme.desc: Two mismatched characters go on a wild road trip in Uttar Pradesh and, while being dogged by a policeman, fall in love.(n)

programme.title: Dhoom 2
programme.desc: Jewel thief and master of disguise Mr A plots his next big heist while being pursued by two cops.(n)

programme.title: Ladies Vs Ricky Bahl
programme.desc: It is a story about a con-man who earns his bread and butter by conning women but at the end gets conned himself.(n)

programme.title: Befikre
programme.desc: Set in Paris, Befikre is the free-spirited, contemporary love story of Dharam and Shyra, two young people who believe in living life to the fullest.(n)

programme.title: Ahishta Ahishta
programme.desc: A professional witness at the marriage registrar helps a runaway girl when her boyfriend does not show up for the wedding. He falls in love with her, but then the missing groom returns.(n)

programme.title: Bank Chor
programme.desc: A comic-caper, that tells the story of 3 morons trying to rob a bank who pick the worst day possible when everything that can go wrong, goes wrong and how they're inadvertently caught in the crossfire.(n)

programme.title: Shikara
programme.desc: This story is about mass evacuation of Kashmiri Pandits in 1990, the story traces the life of newlyweds, who flee their homeland and take refuge at a camp in Jammu, with a promise to return home.(n)

programme.title: 3 Idiots
programme.desc: Two friends search for their long lost college friend and genius "Rancho" played by Aamir Khan with hilarious consequences. Award winning movie from director Rajkumar Hirani. (2009).(n)

programme.title: Sonu Ke Titu Ki Sweety
programme.desc: Titu is going to marry a perfect woman named Sweety. Titu's best-friend Sonu doubts Sweety's character and tries to break the marriage while Sweety tries to do opposite and it creates romantic comedy.(n)

programme.title: Pati Patni Aur Woh - 2019
programme.desc: Things take an unexpected turn when Chintu Tyagi, who is married to Vedika, finds himself infatuated with Tapasya, a young fashion designer.(n)

programme.title: Sultan
programme.desc: Salman Khan stars as the wrestler looking for a comeback with the help of Anushka Sharma. Classic box office topping underdog tale. (2016).(n)

programme.title: Section 375
programme.desc: A filmmaker stands trial when a costume assistant on his movie accuses him of rape.(n)

programme.title: Andaz Apna Apna
programme.desc: Amar and Prem belong to middle-class families but dream big. Both of them vie to win over Raveena, a multimillionaire's daughter and along the way, they run into a local gangster, Teja.(n)

programme.title: Meri Pyaari Bindu
programme.desc: A successful writer Abhimanyu Roy, stuck with writers block, returns to his roots to write an old-fashioned love story.(n)

programme.title: Blackmail‎
programme.desc: When Dev discovers that his wife, Reena, has been cheating on him, he decides to blackmail her and her lover, Ranjit, as a part of his revenge plan.(n)

programme.title: Laaga Chunari Main Daag
programme.desc: A woman sacrifices her own happiness and reputation to financially support her family by working as a call girl.(n)

programme.title: Arjun Patiala
programme.desc: Arjun, a police officer, attempts to rid his town of crime with the help of his confidant, Onida Singh. While at it, he falls in love with Ritu, a news reporter with an agenda of her own.(n)

programme.title: Ek Tha Tiger
programme.desc: India's secret agent Tiger (Salman Khan) is hired on a government mission and falls in love with the enemy (Katrina Kaif). Will their love be accepted or fight their own beliefs to be together? (2012).(n)

programme.title: Mere Brother Ki Dulhan
programme.desc: A quirky romcom where Kush (Imran Khan) finds the ideal Indian bride Dimple (Katrina Kaif) for his brother Luv (Ali Zafar) and a series of comical events follow. (2011).(n)

programme.title: Paathshaala
programme.desc: A school English teacher also teaches music, but ends up leading both teachers and students to revolt against the school management.(n)

programme.title: Yeh Raaste Hain Pyar Ke
programme.desc: Two con artistes and car thieves, Vicky and Sakshi, are faced with death when they accidentally kill Bhanwarlal's brother.(n)

programme.title: Pyaar Impossible
programme.desc: A romantic comedy in which a geek and the most sought-after college beauty are paired together by a twist of fate. And under all odds, an impossible love story begins.(n)

programme.title: Mere Do Anmol Ratan
programme.desc: Suman and Mahesh have been married for several years but have not been blessed with any children. Suman prays in the temple frequently and her prayers are heard and she soon gets pregnant.(n)

programme.title: Ladies Vs Ricky Bahl
programme.desc: It is a story about a con-man who earns his bread and butter by conning women but at the end gets conned himself.(n)

programme.title: Fan
programme.desc: Gaurav's world revolves around the superstar Aryan Khanna. What happens when his passion turns into a dangerous obsessions? Stylish action thriller starring Shahrukh Khan. (2016).(n)

programme.title: Saala Khadoos
programme.desc: The story of a former boxer who quits boxing following a fallout with the authorities over the underlying politics but goes on to coach a fisherwoman to fulfill his dream through her.(n)

programme.title: Josh
programme.desc: Max, who lives with his twin sister Shirley in Goa, is enraged when he finds out that she has fallen in love with Rahul, his bitter rival Prakash's younger brother.(n)

programme.title: Dilwale
programme.desc: A couple in love try to overcome the violent conflict between their respective families.(n)

programme.title: Pyar Mein Twist
programme.desc: Two lonely adults fall in love and decide to get married. However, their grown-up children disapprove and the seniors find themselves torn between love for each other and love for their children.(n)

programme.title: Mubarakan
programme.desc: Identical twin brothers turn to their eccentric uncle for help to make sure that they each marry the woman they love.(n)

programme.desc: Jewel thief and master of disguise Mr A plots his next big heist while being pursued by two cops.(n)

programme.title: Waaris

programme.title: Apne
programme.desc: Baldev (Dharmendra) a disgraced ex-boxer turns to his sons to win the glory that eluded him in the ring. One son agrees with this goal, but the other does not, causing family conflicts. (2007).(n)

programme.title: Thoda Pyaar Thoda Magic
programme.desc: God sends a rambunctious angel to help a businessman and the four orphans, whose parents he killed, become a family.(n)

programme.title: Apradh The Killer
programme.desc: A journalist investigates a series of murders. Although she identifies, he is soon released. But, after he is presumed dead, she is even more determined to solve the mystery behind the killer.(n)

programme.title: Shuddh Desi Romance
programme.desc: Story of the current generation of young boys and girls who stay away from home, date and almost get married and then there are those who run away from their marriage.(n)

programme.title: Lucifer
programme.desc: When the leader of a ruling party dies, there is a power struggle to fill his shoes. His adopted son, the mysterious Stephen, steps in and faces challenges in all spheres of life.(n)

programme.title: Karwaan
programme.desc: Two friends and a chirpy teenager take a road trip from Bangalore to Kochi.(n)

programme.title: Mere Brother Ki Dulhan

programme.title: Krrish 3
programme.desc: The story of Rohit Mehra, a scientist, and Krishna "Krrish" Mehra, his superhero son, who face an elaborate conspiracy orchestrated by the evil genius Kaal.(n)

programme.title: Prassthanam
programme.desc: A rural politician marries a widow with kids and gains a respectable position. He trusts his stepson more than his own in political matters; thus, upsetting his son beyond limits.(n)

programme.title: All The Best: Fun Begins
programme.desc: In order to increase his monthly allowance, Veer lies to his stepbrother Dharm about being married. When Dharm unexpectedly arrives in Goa, he mistakes Prem's wife for Veer's.(n)

programme.title: Bhoomi
programme.desc: A single father battles injustice after his daughter is raped and the perpetrators are not found guilty.(n)

programme.title: Bunty Aur Babli
