programme.title: Khatarnak Khiladi 2
programme.desc: Krishna goes to Mumbai to look for his brother, Raju Bhai, who is a gangster. However, after finding that Raju Bhai has been murdered, he decides to avenge his brother's death.(n)

programme.title: Policegiri
programme.desc: DCP Rudra operates in a city with rampant crime and corruption, courtesy Nagori Subramaniam. However, he decides to stand against him and destroy Nagori once and for all.(n)

programme.title: Achanak
programme.desc: Arjun and his wife are on the run after she is accused of murdering his brother. They must prove her innocence while trying to evade the police as well as the real criminals.(n)

programme.title: Sangdil Sanam
programme.desc: Kailash Nath, a bank manager, is falsely implicated in a bank robbery by Shankar, his son's father-in-law, and sent to prison. However, upon release, he decides to confront Shankar and exact revenge.(n)

programme.title: Imtihan
programme.desc: Vicky, a popular singer, meets and falls in love with Preeti, who does not reciprocate his feelings but agrees to marry him. Soon, he realises that she is hiding something about her past.(n)

programme.title: Inkaar
programme.desc: Rahul, a CEO of an advertising agency, is accused of sexually harassing his protege Maya. Soon, a committee steps in and gives them a chance to clarify their stand.(n)

programme.title: Maine Pyaar Kyun Kiya
programme.desc: Samir lies to his girlfriend, Sonia, that he is in an unhappy marriage. However, when he actually falls in love with her, she requests him to meet his estranged wife, putting him in a predicament.(n)

programme.title: Ajab Prem Ki Ghazab Kahani
programme.desc: Prem falls in love with Jenny, a woman who is already in love with a man named Rahul. Despite this, he agrees to help her marry him and even gets into several comical situations as a result.(n)

programme.title: Power Unlimited
programme.desc: Tirupathi, who wants to become a police officer, must pose as ACP Baldev, his lookalike, to rescue Ganguly, the brother of the Home Minister Jayavardhan.(n)

programme.title: Luv U Soniyo
programme.desc: Mark, a collegian, falls head over heels for Soniyo, who develops feelings for him as well. However, their parents oppose their union as they both hail from different cultural backgrounds.(n)

programme.title: Benny And Babloo
programme.desc: When their restaurant is shut down, Benny and Babloo move to Mumbai in search of jobs Their lives change when one of them gets a job at a five-star hotel while the other gets employed at a dance bar.(n)

programme.title: Yeh Lamhe Judaai Ke
programme.desc: Dushant, an aspiring singer, is encouraged by Jaya to achieve his dreams. However, after Dushant becomes successful, his other friends try to create misunderstandings between him and Jaya.(n)

programme.title: Main Hoon Khiladiyon Ka Khiladi
programme.desc: A man sets out on a mission, full of impediments and villains, to find the treasures hidden by his father in order to free his mother from prison.(n)

programme.title: Sarphira
programme.desc: Suresh, the short-tempered son of Judge B K Sinha, is arrested under the charges of murder, much to the shock of his family. His father is then assigned the case to administer justice.(n)

programme.title: R... Rajkumar
programme.desc: Romeo, a ruffian, starts working for Shivraj, a drug lord, and they end up falling for the same girl, Chanda. Soon, a fight between the two ensues to win her over.(n)

programme.title: Ae Dil Hai Mushkil
programme.desc: Alizeh, an independent woman recovering from a breakup, and Ayan, a naive musician, meet in New York and form an incredible bond. From there, they experience love, heartbreak and the facts of life.(n)

programme.title: De Dana Dan
programme.desc: Two penniless friends are in desperate need of money in order to marry their respective girlfriends. In their attempts to make quick money, they kidnap a rich woman's pet and demand a hefty ransom.(n)

programme.title: Suhaag
programme.desc: Long-lost twins, Amit and Inspector Kishan, happen to cross paths and develop a deep bond. Trouble ensues when their criminal father, who is unaware of his sons' identities, hires Amit to kill Kishan.(n)

programme.title: Kya Yehi Pyaar Hai
programme.desc: Rahul falls in love with Sandhya, a fellow college student, but realises that she does not reciprocate his feelings. Undeterred by her rejection, he still pursues her but pays a huge price for it.(n)

programme.title: Bajirao Mastani
programme.desc: The heroic Peshwa Bajirao, married to Kashibai, falls in love with Mastani, a warrior princess in distress. They struggle to make their love triumph amid opposition from his conservative family.(n)

programme.title: Beqabu
programme.desc: Raja helps imprison a terrorist who then murders him. Years later, Raja's girlfriend comes across his lookalike in Nepal and decides to find the truth.(n)

programme.title: Shortkut - The Con Is On
programme.desc: Shekhar, an assistant director, writes film but refuses to cast his friend, Raju, as the hero. However, when Raju steals his script and becomes a star, Shekhar decides to turn the tables on him.(n)

programme.title: Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania
programme.desc: A girl from Ambala, Kavya Pratap Singh, is about to get married to an NRI. When she visits Delhi to shop for her trousseau, she meets Humpty Sharma, a carefree man, and falls in love with him.(n)

programme.title: Welcome
programme.desc: Two thugs meet Rajeev, who belongs to a respectable family, and want to fix their sister's wedding with him. However, when Rajeev's uncle refuses to the match, a series of hilarious situations occur.(n)

programme.title: Student of the Year 2
programme.desc: Rohan follows his lover, Mridula, to St Teresa's college hoping to reunite with her. There, he befriends Manav, the most popular student, but is constantly at loggerheads with his sister, Shreya.(n)

programme.title: Jaandaar
programme.desc: Jai, an orphan, falls into bad company after Bhagwan, a gangster, gives him shelter and hope to live. However, Jai and Munna, Bhagwan's son, fight with each other after Munna kills an innocent woman.(n)

programme.title: The Return Of Rebel
programme.desc: Rishi's father is killed by his own deceiving brother and a rival who team up against him. Rishi moves to Hyderabad and locates them despite their new fake identities.(n)

programme.title: Asoka
programme.desc: Asoka, the heir to the Maurya Empire, is sent on an exile for having fought with his half-brother, Susima. While travelling south, he meets Kaurwaki, princess of Kalinga, and falls for her.(n)

programme.title: Paheli
programme.desc: A ghost falls in love with a newly-wed woman. To be closer to her, he follows her and takes on the guise of her husband while the latter is away on business.(n)

programme.title: Muqaddar
programme.desc: Shiva and Parshuram, two criminals, are arch-rivals and their enmity worsens when Shiva marries Parshuram's daughter. Due to their rivalry, their city is in turmoil.(n)

programme.title: Special 26
programme.desc: A team of tricksters pose as CBI officers and conduct raids to rob politicians and businessmen of their black money. With the real CBI on their trail, they decide to pull off their biggest heist.(n)

programme.title: Jab Pyaar Kisise Hota Hai
programme.desc: Sooraj Dhanrajgir, a playboy, falls in love with Komal, who rejects him because of his vices and gives him time to change. Things go awry when a little boy shows up claiming to be his son.(n)

programme.title: Brothers
programme.desc: David and Monty, estranged half-brothers, train in mixed martial arts to earn a livelihood. However, things change when the two are forced to compete against each other in the final tournament.(n)

programme.title: Daringbaaz Aashique 2
programme.desc: Ashok falls in love with Deepika, who is his boss Shankar's sister, but Shankar plans Deepika's marriage with another man. Trouble ensues when Shankar's rival tries to kill Deepika.(n)

programme.title: Abhimanyu
programme.desc: Abhimanyu, a professional computer engineer, puts his life at risk and fights for people from poverty-stricken areas so that they receive an education.(n)

programme.title: Dashing Kundi
programme.desc: As Pramila arrives in NYC in search of employment, Vicky, a lover of adventure, helps her navigate some mortifying situations. She is smitten with him but is devastated when he does not reciprocate.(n)

programme.title: Deedar
programme.desc: Anand and Sapna fall in love and want to get married. However, their love is threatened when his father's past misdeeds are revealed and Sapna parts ways with him.(n)

programme.title: Tevar
programme.desc: A kabaddi player tries to safeguard a young woman hounded by a deadly factional leader who wants to marry her against her wish. Eventually, they both fall in love with each other.(n)

programme.title: Force 2
programme.desc: ACP Yashwardhan, a dutiful and honest police officer, teams up with RAW agent Kamaljit Kaur to expose an inside informer who leaks sensitive information to a foreign agency targeting the RAW agents.(n)

programme.title: Mary Kom
programme.desc: When Mary Kom encounters a renowned coach in a boxing gym, she shares her boxing aspirations with him and convinces him to teach her. Despite her father's disapproval, she follows her passion.(n)

programme.title: Main Hoon Surya Singham 2
programme.desc: Duraisingam, an undercover police officer, works in a school in Tamil Nadu and tries to put an end to the criminal activities of Bhai and Thangaraj who rule the area.(n)

programme.title: Rangoon
programme.desc: Julia journeys to the Indo-Burma border to perform for the troops during World War II, on the insistence of Billimoria, her lover. There, she finds herself enamoured by Jemadar Malik, a soldier.(n)

programme.title: Aatank Ki Jung
programme.desc: Meenakshi wants Zareen to help her take action against an ad agency owner, Gowtham. However, due to a turn of events, Meenakshi and Gowtham get intel on a terrorist attack and have to stop it.(n)

programme.title: Awara Paagal Deewana
programme.desc: Dr Anmol, a dentist and henpecked husband, lives a miserable existence in New York due to his domineering wife. However, his troubles increase when he is forced to get embroiled in a mafia rivalry.(n)

programme.title: Vishnu: The He-Man
programme.desc: Vishnu meets his childhood love after fifteen years and tries to woo her without revealing his true identity. But it leads to a misunderstanding and her father fixes her marriage elsewhere.(n)

programme.title: Pyaar Diwana Hota Hai
programme.desc: Sunder, an uneducated man, pretends to be someone who is unable to speak in order to win the compassion of a smart city girl with a big heart.(n)

programme.title: Badrinath Ki Dulhania
programme.desc: Badri, a wealthy man's son, meets Vaidehi at a wedding and sparks fly between them. However, while he wants nothing more than to marry her, she yearns to pursue her dream of becoming an air hostess.(n)

programme.title: Ishq Vishk
programme.desc: To gain popularity in his college and get a girlfriend, Rajiv lies to Payal about being in love with her. When he tries to molest her, she leaves him, and Rajiv tries to pursue another woman.(n)

programme.title: Main Hoon Na
programme.desc: Major Ram is given orders to go undercover as a college student to protect a general's daughter from a rogue soldier. He even has to fulfil his dying father's desire to reconcile with his family.(n)

programme.title: Aiyyaa
programme.desc: An eccentric woman, Meenakshi, meets Surya, a Tamil artist, and is instantly attracted to him. Even when she gets engaged to Madhav, the ideal man, she still dreams of marrying Surya.(n)

programme.title: Luck
programme.desc: Musa, a mafia leader, gives a bunch of people an opportunity to turn their luck around and earn a hefty amount. They are required to play games while people bet on them.(n)

programme.title: LIE
programme.desc: Sathyam and Chaitra meet unexpectedly and decide to only lie to each other. Soon, after they fall in love, Sathyam encounters Padmanabham, a criminal on the run from the Indian police.(n)

programme.title: Singh Saab The Great
programme.desc: Singh Saab is a responsible tax collector who believes in honesty, but Bhoodev, a conniving man, plots against him. Singh adopts a unique way to teach Bhoodev a lesson.(n)

programme.title: Jaan-E-Mann: Let's Fall In Love...
programme.desc: Suhaan, an aspiring actor, is in a fix when Piya files for divorce and forces him to pay a large amount as alimony. To avoid paying her, Suhaan uses Agastya's love for Piya and helps him woo her.(n)

programme.title: OK Jaanu
programme.desc: Adi and Tara are ambitious people who fall in love after meeting at a wedding. They decide on a no-strings-attached live-in relationship, but doubt their decision when their careers pull them apart.(n)

programme.title: Choti Sarrdaarni
programme.desc: After learning about Meher's pregnancy, her politically ambitious mother, Kulwant Kaur, gets her lover killed and forces her to marry Sarabjeet, a well-connected widower with a five-year-old son.(n)

programme.title: Bawara Dil
programme.desc: Following a few misunderstandings, Siddhi and Shiva begin to loathe each other. Soon, their intense dislike turns into hatred and they get married with the determination to destroy each other.(n)

programme.title: Namak Issk Ka
programme.desc: Kahani, a dancer who is also known as Chamcham, is abominated by society for entertaining people for money. Her life takes a turn when she unexpectedly gets married into a reputed family.(n)

programme.title: The Great Indian Global Kitchen
programme.desc: Celebrity chefs cook traditional Indian recipes with an international touch to them to improve the flavour and the style of presentation according to global standards.(n)

programme.title: Dil Ka Rishta
programme.desc: A business tycoon's son falls in love with his childhood sweetheart, an orphan. However, things take an unusual turn when she is adopted by a rich family.(n)

programme.title: Sasural Simar Ka 2
programme.desc: Gitanjali Devi entrusts Simar Bhardwaj with the task of finding an ideal bride for her grandson. Simar's quest ends when she meets her namesake, Simar Narayan, who dreams of making it big as a singer.(n)

programme.title: In Love With My Boss

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: When a Palestinian girl disappears, the Australian media jumps on the news like vultures. She is painted as an Islamic extremist who has joined ISIS. Her family vehemently denies the accusations as they struggle to cope with their grief and confusion.(n)

programme.title: The Coroner: The Plague
programme.desc: A man infected by the plague is found dead in a boat moored at a marine. Detectives discover strong evidence that shows he was not infected by chance but that someone had inoculated him with the bacteria - someone who was in his inner circle.(n)

programme.title: Death For Sale
programme.desc: In Tetouan, Morocco, the city is plagued by poverty. Three close friends, each with dreams of their own but bound by brotherhood, plan a robbery to escape from a hopeless future. But when the heist goes awry, each have to face their new destinies alone.(n)

programme.title: Seven Acts of Mercy
programme.desc: A young illegal immigrant plans to escape her miserable life on the edge of a shanty town. In the process, she meets a mysterious sickly old man and their clashes lead to terrible consequences. Winner of the Don Quijote Award, Locarno Film Festival 2011.(n)

programme.title: My Little Sister
programme.desc: Set in Russia during WWII, little Yamil impatiently awaits the day that his father, whom he has never seen, can return home from battle. One day, mother brings home a traumatized orphan girl Oksana. Yamil finds comfort and hope in loving her as a sister.(n)

programme.title: The Coroner: The Miracle
programme.desc: The mutilated corpse of a young girl buried alive is found in a cemetery. Known as a saint who could heal the sick, detectives look into the details of her “holy” reputation. Faith, superstition and trickery – the line between each is razor thin.(n)

programme.title: The Cliffs Murder
programme.desc: The posh resort of Etretat is in turmoil when the body of one of its most loved resident, Gilbert, is found dead. Investigations rule out suicide and police suspect either a bloody family drama or a sinister, esoteric crime related to the local abbey.(n)

programme.title: Petting Zoo
programme.desc: Berlin Festival nominee Petting Zoo tells a heart-aching story about love, sex, and teen pregnancy in San Antonio, Texas. The film portrays a young woman coming into her own in an environment that does not always present ideal circumstances.(n)

programme.title: Greta's Wedding
programme.desc: Greta is set to marry in a week. Shortly before the big day, she discovers that her divorce papers with her ex-husband have a legal mistake. She goes to great lengths to rectify it – but little does she know that her life will be derailed in ways unimagined.(n)

programme.title: Jirga
programme.desc: In this bracingly raw film about vindication and grace, an Australian ex-soldier goes to Afghanistan to seek absolution from the family of a civilian he had killed in the war. And it will be the 10 year old son of the deceased who will decide his fate.(n)

programme.title: Rafaël
programme.desc: Rafael tells the true story of Tunisian Nazir and his pregnant Dutch wife. They are separated when he is denied entry into Holland and so, Nazir attempts the dangerous sea crossing but ends up caught. Against all odds, his wife fights to rescue him.(n)

programme.title: In Love With My Boss

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: Based on true stories retold by Palestinian refugees, this animation focuses on 11 year-old Wardi’s life in a Lebanese camp. One day, her beloved great-grandfather entrusts her with his most prized possession – the key to their ancestral house in Galilea.(n)

programme.title: The Owners
programme.desc: Forced to leave the city, three siblings return to their family home in a quiet village. But, the District Officer’s alcoholic brother has been squatting there for 10 years and the police are making their lives hell as they fight to get their house back.(n)

programme.title: Verdict
programme.desc: Joy, mother of a six-year-old girl, lives in constant fear of her abusive husband, Dante. One day, Joy flees home and seeks help from the police. As time passes, she discovers an equally nightmarish bureaucracy that cruelly denies her justice and reprieve.(n)

programme.title: The Owners

programme.desc: When his illegal worker is hurt at work, a contractor (Luca Argentero, Italian National Syndicate of Film Journalists 2008) takes his place in an advanced pastry-making course to help him fulfill his dream. Amidst sweets and sweat, he finds himself.(n)

programme.title: Watchtower
programme.desc: Haunted by a tragedy, Nihat has isolated himself as a warden of a remote watchtower. He meets Seher, a hostess, and finds himself compelled to strike a companionship with her. Through their partnership, they find solace and hope in one another.(n)

programme.title: Not Here To Be Loved
programme.desc: Jean-Claude is a disillusioned middle-age man who has long forgotten to smile. He is divorced, has a strained relationship with his only son and thinks his father never loved him. Then, he steps in to a tango school and meets Francoise and life changes.(n)

programme.title: #Instalie
programme.desc: Laras is an influencer and Haikal, her faithful boyfriend cum photographer. Together, they’ve amassed a strong legion of adoring fans. However, their picture-perfect relationship is unexpectedly shattered when Haikal meets a mysterious lady at a party.(n)

programme.title: Strawberry Days
programme.desc: A young Polish farmworker falls in love with the farm owner’s Swedish daughter. He’s poor and exploited while she’s privileged and rich. Their tender love threatens to be foiled when a violent confrontation erupts between their respective communities.(n)

programme.title: My Wife And I
programme.desc: Story of an unhappily married couple on the brink of a divorce. A final intervention comes in the way of a famous Pastor. After prayers, they wake up the next day in each other’s bodies and are now forced to communicate and understand each other better.(n)

Forced to put aside longstanding hostilities, the two team up on a joint mission to stop a mysterious international criminal organization, which is bent on destabilizing the fragile balance of power through the proliferation of nuclear weapons and technology. The duo's only lead is the daughter of a vanished German scientist, who is the key to infiltrating the criminal organization, and they must race against time to find him and prevent a worldwide catastrophe.(n)

programme.title: Final Destination
programme.desc: Death doesn't take no for an answer. Death is coming. And Alex Browning is cursed with knowing when, how and where the grim reaper will take his next victim to the Final Destination. After boarding a plane to Europe with his fellow French club members, high school student Alex Browning (Devon Sawa) has a premonition of the aircraft exploding moments after takeoff, killing every on board. Alex panics, insisting that everyone get off the plane. In the melee than ensues, seven people, including Alex, are forced to disembark--saving them from a fiery death when the plan explodes as Alex foresaw. But as, one by one, each of these seven who cheated fate meets an untimely end, Alex and his remaining friends band together to try change destiny andoutwit the untamable forces of death.(n)

programme.title: Food Factory S1
programme.desc: Discover just how many cheesecakes 15 tons of cream cheese will make; how to make 500,000 perogies a day and not sacrifice quality; why for ice cream sandwiches, human touch is crucial; and what 1 million jars of marmalade and Formula One racing have in common.(n)

programme.title: Food Factory S1
programme.desc: Discover how 15 billion tablets of a historic candy are made; what the real secret ingredent is in the best Pilsener beer; how a modern update of Ancient Egyptian technology allows for the delectable union of blueberries and chocolate.(n)

programme.title: Baby Chimp Rescue S1
programme.desc: Jim and Jenny Desmond never planned to become surrogate parents to 21 chimpanzees, but now their home is bursting at the seams with rescued baby chimps.(n)

programme.title: The Story of China S1
programme.desc: Michael reveals how three cataclysmic revolutions between 1850 and 1950 shook China to the core. He ends his story with Mao's death and the boom time of the last thirty years.(n)

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown S3
programme.desc: Tony explores Punjab - one of the most beautiful and relatively unknown areas of India. Punjab is the Sikh Holy Land, and is also India's agricultural breadbasket.(n)

programme.title: Food Factory S1
programme.desc: Discover how the world's best spuds make it to the dinner plate; why gumballs travel through the twilight zone to become perfectly shaped; just how far hot chocolate has come since the Aztecs invented it; and the secret to recreating finger lickin' barbecue ribs at home.(n)

programme.title: Food Factory S1
programme.desc: Discover how cool coils are essential to the tastiest cold smoked salmon; how special cups give a new spin to age-old yogurt; how 1000 kg of delicious ravioli are made daily; and how making three million pounds of crispy fresh salad can actually be easy.(n)

programme.title: Sacred Wonders S1
programme.desc: From the ancient temples of Angkor Wat in Cambodia to the Shaolin Temple in China, discover what people do for faith in some of the most stunning sacred places on Earth.(n)

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1
programme.desc: Michael Portillo travels through the Socialist Republic of Vietnam. Near the formidable imperial city of Hue, Michael meets milliner Mrs Ngo, who teaches him how to make the iconic conical hat.(n)

programme.title: The Restaurant That Burns Calories
programme.desc: Welcome to a restaurant like no other. Where behind the scenes is not just the kitchen, but a secret gym and an army of exercisers - aiming to burn off every single calorie the diners eat.(n)

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge S2
programme.desc: Robson travels 6000 miles to the most southerly point of Africa to take on an extreme fishing challenge.(n)

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 - Rheas-Cerrado
programme.desc: The rhea, a large, flightless bird, rules the roost in the Pantanal’s grasslands. Watch as rainy-season floods disappear and the region hosts myriad species, including marsh deer, crab-eating foxes, vultures, and giant anteaters.(n)

programme.title: Into The Wild India 1 - A Sloth Bear's Dilemma
programme.desc: In a land of searing heat and tropical storms, life on the plains of southern India is tough. But Bibi, a female sloth bear with two cubs, is up for the challenge of her life as she fights against drought, food scarcity, and predators around every corner.(n)

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Hollywoods Held Hostage
programme.desc: During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger—especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.(n)

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 1 - Catch Me If You Can
programme.desc: Join the rescue as Amanda and Mandy try every trick in the book to help a snared hyena, a lion threatens a village, and the team's plan to release a troop of 13 monkeys is thwarted by last minute surgery and some crafty escape artists.(n)

programme.title: Dogs With Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Rescuers
programme.desc: Dogs around the world come to the rescue in surprising ways. Some search for survivors when disaster strikes or rescue animals from poachers and wildlife traffickers. Others help us in times of trouble—both on land and in the water.(n)

programme.title: Dawn To Dusk 1 - A New Zealand Christmas
programme.desc: See how one animal family’s tragedy is another’s holiday dinner as New Zealand’s mainland and island creatures, including penguins, flightless birds, sea lions, and sharks, battle to feed and protect their young in this marine environment.(n)

programme.title: Dawn To Dusk 1 - India & Sri Lanka's Deadly Mother's Day
programme.desc: Find out which creatures survive and whose luck will run out as animal mothers and moms-to-be struggle with sweltering temperatures, lurking predators, mating season, and drought on a day that proves to be no holiday.(n)

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 2 - Crowded Islands
programme.desc: Travel to the rocky islands off of South Africa’s coast, where thousands of creatures gather to breed. Huge colonies of gannets and hundreds of fur seals compete for space with rare African penguins. See organized chaos become the key to survival.(n)

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 9
programme.desc: Follow an injured opossum into surgery, as the medical team realizes amputation may be the only way to save his badly injured toe. And meet some turtle hatchlings who seem ready for release when the team gets disappointing details about their size.(n)

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Village Raiders
programme.desc: Find out why hunger-ravaged leopards plague a local community. As the leopards roam dangerously close to nearby villages, the conservationist team attempts to safely snare a single leopard to relocate it for the good of man and beast.(n)

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 - Lil' Hunters
programme.desc: Life at the upper end of the food chain means hard work and constant learning. Discover how young predators, from lion and cheetah cubs to coyotes and silver fox kits, learn to move stealthily and harness their highly adapted skills.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 - Dragon Mountain: Surviving the Summit
programme.desc: Every step up the mighty Drakensberg reveals new species who showcase attributes that enable them to endure their harsh mountain home. Meet the sun gazer, the intriguingly named suicide lizard, the iconic bearded vulture and travelling raptors.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 - Lake Manyara National Park
programme.desc: Tanzania's Lake Manyara National Park boasts a number of diverse habitats. From woodland savannas to grassy marshes, visit a region that is a special part of the east African ecosystem and provides a wealth of resources to its wildlife.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 - The Simien Mountains
programme.desc: Known as "the roof of Africa," the Simien mountains hold the rarest creatures on the continent. Travel among plunging cliffs and lush greenery to discover native wildlife like the magnificent walia ibex, cunning Simien wolf and grass grazing geladas.(n)

programme.title: Over Australia 1 - Arid Heart
programme.desc: From the vast, dry plains of the interior come some of Australia’s most recognized imagery, such as the monolithic red rock of Uluru and the bounding red kangaroo. But how did the arid centre of the continent come to be?(n)

programme.title: Over Australia 1 - The Great Divide
programme.desc: Created by titanic forces and spanning 3,700 km along the eastern edge of Australia, the Great Dividing Range separates two very different worlds. Aerial footage and intimate studies reveal how species survive and thrive in this mountain home.(n)

programme.title: Baboons: Rules Of The Troop
programme.desc: Follow four families of four different species – the resourceful Beach Troop, the warlike Desert Troop, the disciplined River Troop, and the peaceful Mountain Band -- to find out why these primates are among the most successful animals in Africa.(n)

programme.title: A Wild Year On Earth 1 - January-February - The Year Begins
programme.desc: In the early months of the year, the Earth’s axial tilt brings the height of summer in some places and the depths of winter in others. See how life struggles to survive under these extreme conditions.(n)

programme.title: A Wild Year On Earth 1 - March-April - A Time of Renewal
programme.desc: Travel around the globe to witness the atmospheric shifts that take place in March, from the wave of cherry blossoms that unfold across Japan to the final raft of green sea turtles that arrive on the Great Barrier Reef islands to lay eggs.(n)

programme.title: A Wild Year On Earth 1 - May-June - A Time Of Volatility
programme.desc: Watch summer unfold in the Northern Hemisphere, while regions close to the equator enter the wet season and Southern Africa goes dry, creating scarcity for some creatures and bounty for others.(n)

programme.title: New Kids In The Wild 1 - Lyca The Painted Wolf
programme.desc: Travel to Central Namibia to meet a painted wolf pup whose pack is battling safety and starvation to survive. Watch as she builds up her hunting skills to help her family move across the parched land to find food and outsmart larger predators.(n)

programme.title: New Kids In The Wild 1 - Chinga The Lion Cub
programme.desc: Roam through South Africa’s Greater Kruger Park with a baby lioness and the pride that must fight off the predators threatening its territory. Will the cub learn the skills to hunt and survive the dangers hiding in the shadows?(n)

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Children of the Storm
programme.desc: Welcome autumn to the north Atlantic, when its animals struggle to prepare for winter. Trace the grey seals’ mating frenzy and witness the horrific price one seal pup must pay. Then see reindeer undertake a perilous swim along their migration path.(n)

programme.title: A Wild Year On Earth 1 - March-April - A Time of Renewal
programme.desc: Travel around the globe to witness the atmospheric shifts that take place in March, from the wave of cherry blossoms that unfold across Japan to the final raft of green sea turtles that arrive on the Great Barrier Reef islands to lay eggs.(n)

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 - Cocos Island
programme.desc: Dubbed "the most beautiful island in the world" by Jacques Cousteau, Cocos Island is a gem among Costa Rica’s national parks. Explore the area’s hammerhead and Galapagos sharks and meet the large marine species that inhabit these deep waters.(n)

programme.title: Over Australia 1 - Arid Heart
programme.desc: From the vast, dry plains of the interior come some of Australia’s most recognized imagery, such as the monolithic red rock of Uluru and the bounding red kangaroo. But how did the arid centre of the continent come to be?(n)

programme.title: New Kids In The Wild 1 - Lyca The Painted Wolf
programme.desc: Travel to Central Namibia to meet a painted wolf pup whose pack is battling safety and starvation to survive. Watch as she builds up her hunting skills to help her family move across the parched land to find food and outsmart larger predators.(n)

programme.title: New Kids In The Wild 1 - Chinga The Lion Cub
programme.desc: Roam through South Africa’s Greater Kruger Park with a baby lioness and the pride that must fight off the predators threatening its territory. Will the cub learn the skills to hunt and survive the dangers hiding in the shadows?(n)

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 - Family Ties
programme.desc: The animal kingdom can be cold and unforgiving, but for baby baboons, penguins, capybaras, and emperor tamarins, having a helpful family makes life a little easier.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 - The Southern Drylands
programme.desc: Venture into the heart of Namibia, where parts of the landscape receive less than an inch of rain each year. Find incredibly resilient creatures from the largest mammals to the fastest insects and a ghost-like fish found nowhere else in the world.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 - Etosha: The Great White Place
programme.desc: Explore a corner of Namibia dominated by stifling heat and parched sand. But the margins of Etosha National Park are dotted with oases that attract herds of thirsty creatures, antelopes, exotic birds, plus the world's biggest elephants.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Africa 1 - The Linear Oasis
programme.desc: The 1,200 mile Orange River is the longest in South Africa. Follow its westward journey, and see a diverse sample of wildlife from powerful swimming birds like the African darter, to flat lizards who inhabit the granite rocks of the Augrabies Falls.(n)

programme.title: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure
programme.desc: Trail Atlantic puffins, Prairie rattlesnakes, Alaskan caribou, and other animals as they travel across the international boundary between the U.S. and Canada. See how they can move from safety to target by crossing a line they had no say in creating.(n)

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Bear
programme.desc: Join a mother brown bear as she struggles to find food for her two young cubs while teaching them essential skills for the harsh winter ahead. Then visit a pair of tiny lynx kittens as they begin to venture away from the safety of their den.(n)

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Wolf
programme.desc: In the remote wilderness of the Carpathian Mountains lives an elusive predator that has inspired awe and fear throughout history: the Eurasian wolf. Discover the vital role that these once-misunderstood hunters play in protecting their ecosystem.(n)

programme.title: Alaskan Summer
programme.desc: Discover the majesty of the US’s most northern state. Shot in stunning HDR, travel from the breathtaking coves and bays of Baranof Island, to the Glacier Bay where humpback and killer whales navigate among towering glaciers and soaring mountains.(n)

programme.title: Untamed Valley 1 - Hippo Lagoon
programme.desc: Secluded and sheltered, away from the hustle and bustle of Zambia’s Luangwa River, Kasikizi lagoon is home to a small community of diverse wildlife. At the height of the wet season, it’s full to the brim with water – a peaceful spot, ideal for two old male hippos who wallow in its watery depths. The lagoon is their sanctuary, a world away from the more violent life they’ve left behind at the main river, where they had to face aggressive beachmasters, willing to fight to protect their territory...(n)

programme.title: Untamed Valley 1 - The Big Bend
programme.desc: The Big Bend is over 2 miles long…one of the biggest meanders along the Luangwa River in Zambia. It’s a busy spot - home to a pod of hippos who luxuriate in its deep pools, an important crossing point for elephants and place to drink for huge herds of buffalo.(n)

programme.title: Untamed Valley 1 - Ebony Plain
programme.desc: Bustling with wildlife, a grassland lies at the heart of Zambia’s Luangwa Valley known to locals as "The Ebony Plain". It’s a busy little neighbourhood - home to a family of warthogs, a troop of baboons and a solitary female leopard named Olimba. Watch as life and death unfold on a daily basis in this corner of the Zambian wilds.(n)

programme.title: A Bee's Diary
programme.desc: In a beehive, tens of thousands of tiny animals work toward a common goal: the survival of the colony. But what is life like for an individual honeybee? A Bee’s Diary tells that story.(n)

programme.title: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure
programme.desc: Trail Atlantic puffins, Prairie rattlesnakes, Alaskan caribou, and other animals as they travel across the international boundary between the U.S. and Canada. See how they can move from safety to target by crossing a line they had no say in creating.(n)

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 - Socorro Islands
programme.desc: A tiny volcanic archipelago rising from the untamed waters of the eastern Pacific, the Socorro Islands have been called the Mexican Galapagos. Get ready for jaw-dropping encounters with giant Pacific manta rays, dolphins, and white tip reef sharks.(n)

programme.title: Untamed Valley 1 - Hippo Lagoon
programme.desc: Secluded and sheltered, away from the hustle and bustle of Zambia’s Luangwa River, Kasikizi lagoon is home to a small community of diverse wildlife. At the height of the wet season, it’s full to the brim with water – a peaceful spot, ideal for two old male hippos who wallow in its watery depths. The lagoon is their sanctuary, a world away from the more violent life they’ve left behind at the main river, where they had to face aggressive beachmasters, willing to fight to protect their territory...(n)

programme.title: Untamed Valley 1 - The Big Bend
programme.desc: The Big Bend is over 2 miles long…one of the biggest meanders along the Luangwa River in Zambia. It’s a busy spot - home to a pod of hippos who luxuriate in its deep pools, an important crossing point for elephants and place to drink for huge herds of buffalo.(n)

programme.title: Untamed Valley 1 - Ebony Plain
programme.desc: Bustling with wildlife, a grassland lies at the heart of Zambia’s Luangwa Valley known to locals as "The Ebony Plain". It’s a busy little neighbourhood - home to a family of warthogs, a troop of baboons and a solitary female leopard named Olimba. Watch as life and death unfold on a daily basis in this corner of the Zambian wilds.(n)

programme.title: A Bee's Diary
programme.desc: In a beehive, tens of thousands of tiny animals work toward a common goal: the survival of the colony. But what is life like for an individual honeybee? A Bee’s Diary tells that story.(n)

programme.title: Nature Scenes 1 - Cozumel Mexico Underwater Part 1
programme.desc: One half hour of uninterrupted bull sharks deep in Cozumel's underwater reefs. Watch as these huge sharks swim and interact with the other inhabitants of these coral reefs.(n)

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 10
programme.desc: Meet a flock of cedar waxwings who have taken over the centre’s aviary and are keeping the staff busy with endless demands for food. Then the rescue team works with the Ministry of Natural Resources to relocate a coyote that’s too people-friendly.(n)

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Relentless Sun
programme.desc: Witness the troubles that arise after a once-in-a-generation drought has sucked all the moisture from surrounding rivers. The conservationists struggle to keep up with the number of thirsty animals as some succumb and others survive.(n)

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 2 - Return To The Wild
programme.desc: Nature is under pressure and South Africa is paying the price. But with new investment in ecotourism, populations of animals are rebounding and many species are being reintroduced. Witness one of the most exciting conservation success stories in Africa.(n)

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 - Giant Otter Refuge
programme.desc: Join biologists on a hike through a giant otter refuge in the southern Pantanal. Will they find these shy, elusive animals or just the evidence of their day-to-day lives? On the trail, check in on amorous tapirs and water-loving Muscovy ducks.(n)

programme.title: Baboons: Rules Of The Troop
programme.desc: Follow four families of four different species – the resourceful Beach Troop, the warlike Desert Troop, the disciplined River Troop, and the peaceful Mountain Band -- to find out why these primates are among the most successful animals in Africa.(n)

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Wolf
programme.desc: In the remote wilderness of the Carpathian Mountains lives an elusive predator that has inspired awe and fear throughout history: the Eurasian wolf. Discover the vital role that these once-misunderstood hunters play in protecting their ecosystem.(n)

programme.title: Dawn To Dusk 1 - Pacific Islands: Commotion In The Ocean
programme.desc: Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.(n)

programme.title: Dawn To Dusk 1 - Australian Spring Fever
programme.desc: Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.(n)

programme.title: Baboons: Rules Of The Troop
programme.desc: Follow four families of four different species – the resourceful Beach Troop, the warlike Desert Troop, the disciplined River Troop, and the peaceful Mountain Band -- to find out why these primates are among the most successful animals in Africa.(n)

programme.title: Carpathian Predators 1 - Realm of the Wolf
programme.desc: In the remote wilderness of the Carpathian Mountains lives an elusive predator that has inspired awe and fear throughout history: the Eurasian wolf. Discover the vital role that these once-misunderstood hunters play in protecting their ecosystem.(n)

programme.title: Gangs Of Lemur Island 1 - The Road to Independence
programme.desc: As the babies grow, new power struggles break out in each troop. Watch as every member, from fierce Queen Crystal to low-ranking Erica, jockeys for position. Meanwhile, the babies start to understand how allies and enemies will shape their future.(n)

programme.title: Gangs Of Lemur Island 1 - The Berenty Dynasty
programme.desc: The pressure to find food reaches new heights and throws the reserve into turmoil. Witness fractures emerge within the ranks, dividing the gangs and leading Crystal, the indomitable leader of the Ruins gang, to face a challenge like none before.(n)

programme.desc: The pressure to find food reaches new heights and throws the reserve into turmoil. Witness fractures emerge within the ranks, dividing the gangs and leading Crystal, the indomitable leader of the Ruins gang, to face a challenge like none before.(n)

programme.title: Nature Scenes 1 - Cozumel Mexico Underwater Part 2
programme.desc: One half hour of uninterrupted marine wildlife in Cozumel. Dive underwater to discover the huge diversity within these coral reefs. Get up close with sea turtles, colourful fish, eel and more.(n)

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 11
programme.desc: Join the rescue team for a madcap chase after a red-tailed hawk. He may be unable to fly, but he sure can run! Then follow the recovery of a rare albino squirrel who can’t walk, and see how the medical team ensures he’ll be ready for the wild again.(n)

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Bush Camps
programme.desc: Explore eco-tourism, the financial backbone that keeps the park operating. Visit the varying accommodations, from comfortable camping to luxurious lodgings, and see how guests are living amongst nature and even assist in tracking wildlife.(n)

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - Tidal Forest Of Africa
programme.desc: Follow a day in the life of the residents of a southern African mangrove forest, meeting red-claw mangrove crabs that manage the forest, vervet monkeys that occupy the canopy, and mudskippers and fiddler crabs that rule the mudflats.(n)

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 - The Pantanal
programme.desc: The Pantanal experiences extreme climatic shifts, from brutal droughts during the searingly hot dry season to floods created by rainy-season tempests. See how the region’s diverse animal population works to coexist and ensure collective survival.(n)

programme.title: A Wild Year On Earth 1 - January-February - The Year Begins
programme.desc: In the early months of the year, the Earth’s axial tilt brings the height of summer in some places and the depths of winter in others. See how life struggles to survive under these extreme conditions.(n)

programme.title: Alaskan Summer
programme.desc: Discover the majesty of the US’s most northern state. Shot in stunning HDR, travel from the breathtaking coves and bays of Baranof Island, to the Glacier Bay where humpback and killer whales navigate among towering glaciers and soaring mountains.(n)

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 2 - In the Path of a Volcano
programme.desc: Learn about two volcanoes that threaten the people living in their paths. See how the town of Pahoa, Hawaii, reacts as a river of lava flows towards them, while the Indonesian government tries to relocate thousands to address an increasing threat.(n)

programme.title: Surviving The Amazon 1 - Jungle Killers
programme.desc: A jaguar stalks the riverbank. A venomous snake is on the move. A Colombian tarantula waits for night fall. Watch as these fierce predators prowl through the jungle and bite into their next great meal.(n)

programme.desc: A jaguar stalks the riverbank. A venomous snake is on the move. A Colombian tarantula waits for night fall. Watch as these fierce predators prowl through the jungle and bite into their next great meal.(n)

programme.title: Nature Scenes 1 - Baby Fawn
programme.desc: One half hour of uninterrupted footage of a beautiful fawn fighting to keep its eyes open. Peaceful and absolutely adorable this sleepy baby deer is ready for a nap. Animals in captivity filmed at Australia's Queensland Zoo.(n)

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 12
programme.desc: Check in with the centre’s resident turkey vulture, who’s ready for release and in search of a flock. While Nathalie and her team rush to secure funding for a new facility, the medical team is baffled by a toad who has mysteriously taken ill.(n)

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Girls of Oryx Plain
programme.desc: Watch staff soothe a wild baby rhino after her mother is illegally shot. It’s a dire situation, and the calf will have to be hand-raised. Also, meet a 4-year-old captive rhino that went through the same thing and is now entering a new life stage.(n)

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - The Okavango: Lifeblood of the Kalahari
programme.desc: Declared a RAMSAR site and considered one of the world’s most renowned wilderness areas, Africa’s Okavango Delta is home to a wide variety of African wildlife, from the big five megafauna species to more than 400 birds and 70 species of rare fish.(n)

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 - And So It Begins…
programme.desc: Head to the heart of Central Kalimantan, Borneo—home to one of the most unique schools in the world. There are 68 students in all, including class clown Valentino (who loves a short-cut) and class couple Darril and Liti (who have their first fight).(n)

programme.title: A Wild Year On Earth 1 - March-April - A Time of Renewal
programme.desc: Travel around the globe to witness the atmospheric shifts that take place in March, from the wave of cherry blossoms that unfold across Japan to the final raft of green sea turtles that arrive on the Great Barrier Reef islands to lay eggs.(n)

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Great Addo Elephant
programme.desc: Covering 1,600 square kilometres in South Africa, Addo Elephant National Park is home to far more species than its namesake animal. Meet many of its fascinating residents, including white rhinos, great white sharks, and adorable African penguins.(n)

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Table Mountain
programme.desc: Harsh storms, wildfires, and heavy seas define Table Mountain National Park. Learn how its native animals and plants work together on the parched hillsides and windswept cliffs to form symbiotic partnerships that ensure mutual survival.(n)

programme.title: Nature Scenes 1 - Jasper National Park Canada Elk
programme.desc: Half an hour of uninterrupted elk and fall forest vistas. Watch elk prepare for the rut surrounded by the beauty of Jasper National Park in fall.(n)

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 - Chemical Weapons
programme.desc: Keep your distance from these natural-born killers. Armed with venom and other poisonous tools that make hunting easier (and escape impossible), nudibranches, cuttlefish, giant centipedes, and assassin bugs are all dressed to kill.(n)

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Critical Plains

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - Urban Penguins
programme.desc: An unusual colony of African penguins have learned to live with their human neighbours on the southwestern tip of Africa, but their tenacity is tested by golf courses, highways, pets, and a sea of curious humans who view them as a tourist attraction.(n)

programme.title: A Wild Year On Earth 1 - May-June - A Time Of Volatility

programme.title: Untamed Valley 1 - The Big Bend
programme.desc: The Big Bend is over 2 miles long…one of the biggest meanders along the Luangwa River in Zambia. It’s a busy spot - home to a pod of hippos who luxuriate in its deep pools, an important crossing point for elephants and place to drink for huge herds of buffalo.(n)

programme.title: Where's Wally?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2
programme.desc: The Case Of The Silent Parrot - The Pirate Captain is very worried. Scurvy the parrot isn't saying a word. Without him navigating they won't be able to go treasure hunting anymore! Why is Scurvy so quiet? Is there something wrong? Or is he hiding something? It's up to Noddy to investigate!(n)

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2
programme.desc: The Case Of The Vanished Ninjas - The Ninjas are preparing for an acrobatics show. But after Pat-Pat decorates them with glitter they don't turn up for their rehearsal. Noddy investigates, looking for the Ninjas, but only finds sticky things have gone missing round Toyland - Pat-Pat's glue-stick, the Naughticorns' sticky tape, the Builders' sticky putty. Noddy works out that the glitter made the Ninjas non sticky, so they borrowed sticky things to try and make themselves sticky again. Case closed!(n)

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Huffty Loses His Voice - Huffty has lost his voice. While Raa Raa and his friends try and work out what has happened to it, Huffty has to mime to make himself understood.(n)

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa Finds A Voice - Raa Raa is upset when Topsy suggests that he should stick to doing "Raa Raa" things. He sets out to prove Topsy wrong. Will the noisy little lion learn that sometimes it's best just to be yourself?(n)

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales
programme.desc: Why Wildebeest Stampede - You see there was a time when Wildebeest didn't stampede. They used to stand on the plains and munch grass all day. But there were so many of them and they were eating so much grass that all the animals had to do something about it. Tortoise realized that the Wildebeest weren't the brightest animals in Tinga Tinga and they always did whatever the last beast said. So the animals decided to tell the Wildebeest that ‘they were welcome to stay in Tinga Tinga and they must never RUN!' So what did the Wildebeest do? They ran and they ran and they RAN! So that's Why Wildebeest Stampede! Tales from Africa.(n)

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales
programme.desc: Why Chameleon Changes Colour - You see there was a time when Chameleon wasn't bright and colourful at all. In fact Chameleon was rather dull and grey… like a rainy day. One day when all the animals are playing games and sheltering from the rains Chameleon decides to slip away because he feels boring. Butterfly comes across Chameleon sitting sadly on a rock and shows him a rainbow. Chameleon can't resist and stands on the Rainbow, and TA-DAH!! He turns red and yellow and pink and green! Chameleon soaks up all the colours of the magical rainbow and now, KAPOW!! Chameleon can be any colour he wants! Tales from Africa.(n)

programme.title: Guess With Jess
programme.desc: How Can We Make The Most Beautiful Garden Ever? - Poor Mimi! Her normally beautiful garden is all messy and full of swirly piles of earth. She's really upset and Jess promises to her help her make it the most beautiful garden ever! Raking away the swirls doesn't work, they just come back! Jess and Mimi realise that worms are making the swirly piles of earth. Mimi wants to move them away but they go back underground before she can catch them. When it rains the worms come back and Jess and Mimi gather up the worms in a bucket and take them to live in the orchard by a patch of scrappy flowers. The garden still isn't looking at it's best though! After the worms have gone Mimi's flowers go all droopy. Willow explains that worms make help make the soil rich and good for plants – and that's what makes the flowers bloom. Jess remembers that the worms had come out when it rained. They water the ground to bring the worms up to the surface again. The worms agree to come back to Mimi's garden and soon her garden is beautiful again. Yippety Yay!(n)

programme.title: Guess With Jess
programme.desc: Why Are There Little Hills In The Orchard? - Jess and the pups have been looking after the orchard while Willow's been on holiday but the day she's due back the orchard is full of little piles of earth. What's making them? That's the Big Question. Jess wonders if someone put them there. He asks Mimi, who's making a pile of earth while she digs a hole. She tells him she's going to plant an apple tree. Maybe someone's been planting new apple trees in the orchard thinks Jess. But when he looks carefully there are no holes or newly planted trees. Horace the hoppy frog suggests that maybe it's an invisible digger who's digging underground. Billie the little mouse arrives and tells Jess that the little piles of earth are called molehills. Jess works out that the piles of earth are in a line. Maybe someone is digging a tunnel underground so they can travel right across the orchard. They keep very quiet and a tiny mole pops out above ground. That's who's been making piles of earth in the orchard. They've answered the question. Hooray!(n)

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S1
programme.desc: While You Weren'T Sleeping / The Secret Strife Of Pets - In this original series Harvey Street Kids, DreamWorks Animation Television takes you to an unusual place called Harvey Street where every day feels like best Saturday ever with never-ending games, a 42-flavor ice cream truck and the greatest climbing tree in town. Thanks to BFFs Audrey, Lotta, and Dot, Harvey Street is kept kid-ruled and adult-free for all the kids in town. They do whatever it takes - from creating an indestructible friendship bracelet to inventing a new holiday to fill the seemingly endless hours of a summer afternoon - to guarantee life is always great and Harvey Street is the best place to never grow up!(n)

Only problem is that the Guitar Key is what Wizard Melodia plays the guitar to control the rising & setting of the blue moon every 2.5 years. Wally and Wenda head to Argentina to help Wizard Melodia get the Guitar Key back and put Buenos Aires back to normal.(n)

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Suitcase - Pat-Pat is packing for a sleepover at the Palace when her suitcase goes missing. Noddy follows the clues and discovers that the Pockets took the suitcase in order to get Pat-Pat's sleepy pillow. They wanted to keep the pillow because it reminds them of Pat-Pat and they would miss her while she was at the sleepover. Noddy finds the Pockets and the suitcase in the dark, just in time for the sleepover. Queen Sparklewings invites everyone to the sleepover. Well done Noddy!(n)

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2
programme.desc: The Case Of The Two Parties - The Naughticorns are having a party and naturally they want everyone to come. Trouble is, so are the Pirates. But when no one turns up to either party, Noddy investigates: Why has no one come to either party?(n)

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Zebby's Snack Time - Zebby likes to have a snack when she is feeling tired. Raa Raa thinks this is a great idea and decides to join his friend. Except he thinks they should have their snack in the perfect place… but everywhere they try is just too noisy… I wonder why that could be?!(n)

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Finding Noisy - Raa Raa gets carried away when collecting fun noisy objects in the jungle with his friends. Raa Raa wants to keep everything he finds for himself, but soon discovers that his collection isn't much fun with nobody to share it with.(n)

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales
programme.desc: Why Leopard Has Spots - You see there was a time when Leopard didn't have spots. All the animals had something special; Lion had his mane, Peacock his beautiful tail, Zebra his stripes… but Leopard was as plain as plain can be. Then one day Leopard made friends with Puff Adder with his bright colourful spots. Tales from Africa.(n)

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales
programme.desc: Why Hyena Has Short Back Legs - You see there was a time when Hyena didn't have short back legs. He was always chasing around and nipping other animals on the bottom. Then one day the animals had enough. It was time to teach that naughty Hyena a lesson! Tales from Africa.(n)

programme.title: Guess With Jess
programme.desc: Why Are There So Many Ladybirds? - One winter morning Jess finds lots of ladybird in his barn. Why are they there? That's the Big Question! Mimi tells him that she has lots of ladybirds in her garden in the summer. They're always hungry and brilliant for the plants because they eat all the greenfly. Maybe they're looking for greenfly in his barn? Jess doesn't think so. There are no greenfly in the barn. He goes to ask Baa and Billie for help. They're saying goodbye to Little Bird who's flying away to a warmer country for the winter. Jess thinks maybe the ladybirds are gathering to fly away too and rushes back to his barn to say goodbye. But when he gets there he finds that the ladybirds are now all huddled together and fast asleep. What's going on? Jess goes to ask Willow and finds a hedgehog sleeping under some leaves near the stable. Willow explains that some animals find it hard to find food in the winter, especially if they can't store it, so they eat as much as they can and then go to sleep during the winter. It's called hibe.(n)

programme.title: Guess With Jess
programme.desc: How Can I Stop Little Bird Eating The Seeds? - Mimi's really upset with Little Bird who keeps eating all her lettuce seeds. Jess wonders how they can stop her. They try putting out extra food for her but Little Bird just eats everything! Jess wonders if covering the seeds with something so that Little Bird can't reach them would work. Mimi says it's a good idea but the sun won't reach the seeds either – which means they won't grow. The only thing that seems to stop t Little Bird is when she sees Jess and is frightened away. But Jess can't stand still in the vegetable patch forever! Willow sees him and tells him he's being a scarecrow. A scarecrow? Yes, something that scares away the birds. Mimi has a brilliant idea to make the perfect scarecrow. A Jess scarecrow. Little Bird stops eating the lettuce seeds and eats from the lovely bird table they put out for her instead. Hooray!(n)

programme.desc: Moles - Jack Sprat and Puss journey underground in search of treasure and discovery a kingdom of moles led by a rather bizarre king.(n)

programme.title: All Hail King Julien
programme.desc: That Sinking Feeling - When Masikura convinces King Julien that the island is sinking, Julien believes building an ark is the only way to save his people.(n)

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On
programme.desc: Trolly Tales 2 / Rainbowmageddon - The Trolls try to entertain and win over Archer Pastry with a series of Troll stories/When a rainbow over Troll Village begins to experience a catastrophic breakdown, Cloud Guy arrives in the village to offer his assistance.(n)

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: Chilling Out In Antarctica - The Wanderers travel to Antarctica to witness the annual march of the penguins. Odlulu and Fritz show up looking to build an awesome fort using the Ice Castle Key. Odlulu's new ice fort separates a waddle of penguins from their eggs. The Wanderers must find a way through the ice fort to reunite the parents with their chicks.(n)

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2
programme.desc: The Case Of The Messed-Up Painting - Queen Sparklewings has done a beautiful painting to use in her Story-Time afternoon. But then Coco and Noddy discover it ruined! Coco thinks that Bling must have done it but she protests her innocence. Noddy investigates: who messed up the Queen's painting - and can he get it fixed again in time? Keep investigating, Noddy!(n)

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2
programme.desc: The Case Of The Deltoid's Challenge - "Deltoid accepts the Ninja's challenge to run around the loop-theloop. But when he fails on his first attempt, he feels ready to give up in despair. Noddy investigates: How can he help Deltoid do his challenge?".(n)

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Ooo Ooo's Jungle Drums - Raa Raa has found an infectious beat, and soon all the other animals in the jungle are joining in… except for Ooo Ooo, who just can't get the beat right. How can they find a way for all the friends to play together?(n)

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Topsy's Musical Stones - Topsy has readied the musical stones for a noisy game. Raa Raa has been left in charge, making sure that nobody jumps on them while Topsy reminds the other jungle inhabitants about the game. But temptation can be strong… especially when Ooo Ooo is about...(n)

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales
programme.desc: Why Ants Work Together - You see there was a time when Ants didn't work together. The Ants desperately wanted to build themselves a home, but all the animals kept sitting on them, or sneezing them far away or swooping them up into tall trees! On the point of giving up, one brave, young soldier ant rallies the troops… “Pamoja! Together! Together they can do anything!!!”… and he was right. Tales from Africa.(n)

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales
programme.desc: Why Flea Jumps - You see there was a time when Flea didn't jump. Flea didn't really move at all. She was very big and very round. All Flea wanted to do was to see the world. The Tinga Tinga animals try to help lift Flea high up, but she is too heavy. Then Tortoise comes up with an idea ‘Movement and activity!' and after many attempts Flea discovers that she can jump. She can jump really high! Then Flea can jump everywhere and see everything.! Tales from Africa.(n)

programme.title: Guess With Jess
programme.desc: How Can I Go Up And Down On The See-Saw? - Baa and Billie have built a fantastic new see-saw in the meadow. Jess can't wait to have a go. But when he tries to make it go up and down with him on one end and Baa and Billie on the other he just gets stuck in the air and can't get the see saw down. ‘How can I go up and down on the see saw?' he asks? -desperate to have all the ‘up and down' fun he see the puppies having when they jump on the see-saw. Jess asks Horace the hoppy frog what he knows about ‘up and down', he talks to Willow about scales and weighing things until finally he works it out – if he finds someone roughly the same weight as him – balanced just like the puppies were - he'll do it! He works out that Mimi - of all his friends- weighs about the same as him and just as he worked out they jump on the see saw and go up and down, up and down and have a fantastic time! Yippety Yay!(n)

programme.title: Guess With Jess
programme.desc: What Can I Do With My Nature Collection? - JESS shows Mimi his lovely Nature Collection. She really likes it and wonders what he's going to do with it. Now that's a good question! Jess thinks he'll display it but with the pups racing around it'd soon get damaged. He asks Horace if he could use it to make musical instruments – some things make a great sound but others aren't so good. It's time to go on a picnic with Mimi and his friends. Jess brings his Nature Collection along and when all his friends want to play a game Jess has a great idea. He's found the perfect thing to do with his Nature Collection! They can use them to make a funny obstacle course race. Brilliant!(n)

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: Bridge - When a volcano erupts displacing hundreds of Dinotrux, Ty and crew build a giant bridge for entry to the crater but D-Structs and his gang trap them.(n)

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: Lucky And The Field Trip Fraud - Lucky is determined to shed her reputation as “teacher’s pet” on the class field trip.(n)

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: What Screams May Come/Grunt Anything - Eep joins the Scream-Leading team and starts picking up characteristics of her coach, Meep, much to Ugga's chagrin/Meep kicks Snoot out of the cave for not being a brave hunter. The Croods reluctantly take Snoot in and try to make him into a hunter to get him out of their home.(n)

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S1
programme.desc: Fruless / Citizen Cape - In this original series Harvey Street Kids, DreamWorks Animation Television takes you to an unusual place called Harvey Street where every day feels like best Saturday ever with never-ending games, a 42-flavor ice cream truck and the greatest climbing tree in town. Thanks to BFFs Audrey, Lotta, and Dot, Harvey Street is kept kid-ruled and adult-free for all the kids in town. They do whatever it takes - from creating an indestructible friendship bracelet to inventing a new holiday to fill the seemingly endless hours of a summer afternoon - to guarantee life is always great and Harvey Street is the best place to never grow up!(n)

programme.desc: Xerx Works - On a mission to destroy the factory that manufactures Octavian’s Xerx warriors, Cleo and Pharaoh Yosira butt heads over who’s in charge and Mihos masquerades as a cabbage.(n)

programme.title: Where's Wally? S2
programme.desc: Baa-Baa For Now, New Zealand - When Odlulu enters Fritz as a dog in a sheepherding competition, Fritz uses the Magnet Key to gently guide all the sheep. But when he loses control of the sheep and they spill into Auckland, the Wanderers must find a way to lead the flock back where they belong.(n)

Seeking to prove that he is a helpful Troll, he agrees to assist Tug Duluth in finding a new tour.(n)

programme.desc: Copy Cat - When Puss accidentally agrees to ride for both Artephius and the orphans in the annual San Lorenzo horse race, his twin Puss Dos enters the race.(n)

programme.title: Casper's Scare School

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1
programme.desc: Rupert And The Magic Books - When Ping Pong says she is too busy to join a story reading day Raggety magically brings the books to life and they fly to Ping Pong's Pagoda, where they start to tell her their stories.(n)

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1
programme.desc: Rupert And The Mischievous Genie - Rupert, Ping Pong, Bill, Edward and Raggety find some magical, musical stepping stones deep in the woods and unwittingly unleash a naughty young genie bent on making mischief.(n)

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car
programme.desc: Crash Landing - Hellie makes an emergency landing. Despite everyone's efforts, Hellie won't fly again… what could the problem be?(n)

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car
programme.desc: Plugger's New Job - James has broken down so Mama Mia comandeers Plugger to run her about. Mama Mia has a wonderful time with Plugger and James is jealous. He tries to remedy the situation with disastrous consequences.(n)

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots
programme.desc: My Fair Bumble - Bumble has been asked to Aunt Tulip's for tea but he is worried that his manners are not up to scratch. He asks the other tots to help him out.(n)

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots
programme.desc: Pineapple Palace Panic - Fifi is supposed to be babysitting Grubby, but she's forgotten! Stingo and Slugsy step in to cover for her, with disastrous results!(n)

programme.title: 3-2-1 Penguins!
programme.desc: Promises, Promises - The Penguins take Michelle to Planet “Cross Your Heart” where they find a little Sock Monkey alien girl who promised to keep her finger in a wall that holds back a Sea of Grape Sode, but also promised her mother to clean her room before lunch. Michelle promises to take over for her. All is well and good until it seems the Alien Girl isn't coming back. And Michelle needs to get going, too. They rescue the city from being flooded, but not before they learn the value of keeping your word and not promising more than you can live up to.(n)

programme.title: George Of The Jungle
programme.desc: Were George / The Master Of Macho - After watching Ursula, George thinks that running the jungle would be a whole lot easier if the animals were terrified of him./Tiger is after the coveted Master of Macho title, and there's only one way to win it – capturing the legendary Chupacabra.(n)

programme.title: Veggietales: In The House
programme.desc: The Bob & Larry Show / Save The Cherry Cat - Beau Rockley drives Bob and Larry apart when he interferes with their TV show /Granny Asparagus offers to bake cookies for Larry, Jimmy, and Jerry if they can look after her cherry cat.(n)

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle
programme.desc: Amazamoose And Squirrel Wonder: Chapter Two - When a mysterious goop gives Fearless Leader real life superpowers, Rocky and Bullwinkle must reprise their masked hero personas.(n)

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: Grugs First Chance / Furry Road - Tired of settling disputes between Valleyites, Grug invents “Chance,” a two-sided rock that can be flipped to determine all decisions in the Valley; In a nature documentary-style, Thunk tells the story of Beary, a peaceful Thunk-like cub that struggles to fit into a violent bear owl culture.(n)

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show
programme.desc: The Show's The Thing / Peter Cooper - Peabody invites Shakespeare on the show in hopes of being cast as Romeo. When he doesn't get the part, he does anything and everything to fix the mistake.(n)

programme.title: Denver The Last Dinosaur
programme.desc: Teething Problems - Harry and Denver have to babysit a turbulent boy, but the child brings out the brat in Denver.(n)

programme.title: Denver The Last Dinosaur
programme.desc: In Search Of The Gold Ticket - Harry and Denver have lost Dan's gold ticket and need to win a sweepstakes to replace it.(n)

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S2
programme.desc: Lost - Tricked into a town-wide clean-up, Dennis and Walter are paired up against their wills. When their bickering leads them off course, they’re forced to cooperate to survive in the wilderness of Beanotown Woods.(n)

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S2
programme.desc: The Great Beanotown Comic Con - The gang produce a hand-drawn comic which is a surprise hit all round Beanotown. Envious of their success, Walter embarks on a mission of cartoon-drawing sabotage.(n)

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Dastardlys Deed Of The Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.(n)

programme.desc: Night Of The Frodarg - On a dark and stormy night, Tim's fears of a local legend and Boss Baby's fear of a PuppyCo agent force the brothers to unite to stay safe as the house is infiltrated.(n)

programme.desc: Danger In The Forbidden City - Po and the Kids finally arrive in the Forbidden City. After an assassination scare, Xiao enlists Po and the 4Cs for help protecting her during her father's funeral.(n)

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Mermaid - To prove he's a ladies' man, Puss rescues a mermaid, who instantly falls in love with him … and becomes his worst nightmare.(n)

programme.title: All Hail King Julien
programme.desc: The Jungle Rooster - When the Jungle Rooster keeps him up at night, Julien discovers that the Foosa have been farming chickens for food and risks his life to free them all.(n)

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On
programme.desc: Coop, Where's My Guy? / Fluffleberry Quest - When Cooper loses Guy Diamond in Troll Forest, Poppy and Branch accompany him as he retraces his steps /Poppy sets out to recreate the recipe of Branch's favorite dessert at any cost.(n)

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: Mini Mayhem In Moscow - Whitebeard uses the Grow Key to make himself 40' tall. But the key breaks! So the Wanderers take the key to Wizard Fix-It in Moscow. While fixing the key, Fix-It accidentally makes Waldo, Wenda and herself two inches tall! So begins a Nutcracker-like mini-adventure in Moscow to retrieve the key from Odlulu and Fritz.(n)

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2
programme.desc: The Case Of The Knights On Patrol - The Knights set off on their patrol but are delayed by someone playing tricks on them. Noddy investigates: who's playing tricks on the Knights? He soon finds them in Fable Forest, waylaid by yet another cheeky trick. Noddy will have to find the culprit before the Knights end up in serious trouble!(n)

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2
programme.desc: The Case Of The Delayed Repairs - The railway tracks are being repaired all over Toyland by the Builders, so Farmer Tom, Tractor and a trailer are running a replacement service. But the repairs take longer than expected when the Builders' tools go missing. Noddy investigates, and finds that Cloppycorn loved the trailer rides so much that he hid the biolders' tools in a basket that Pat-Pat had asked him to take to the other Naughticorns. Cloppycorn apologies, the tracks are swiftly repaired, and Cloppycorn happily rides around the farm on the trailer. Well done Noddy !(n)

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa's Noisy Present - Raa Raa has made his friend Topsy a wonderful present - a noisy set of chimes. But she doesn't want them. Who else in the jungle might like a very noisy set of wind chimes?(n)

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa's Big Roar - Raa Raa finds it really funny that all his friends come running every time he roars really loudly. The other jungle inhabitants are less amused, they only come because there are worried about their friend. What is Raa Raa to do when he gets into trouble and nobody comes to his rescue?(n)

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales
programme.desc: Why Hummingbird Hums - You see there was a time when Hummingbird didn't hum. She was called Songbird and Songbird thought she could sing like a Bird… but sadly that was not the case. All the animals tried to help Songbird improve her singing but nothing worked. What could they do?! Then Tortoise has an idea, maybe Songbird can sing without opening her beak!! Songbird agrees and hums the most beautiful hum Tinga Tinga has ever heard. From that day on Songbird was called Hummingbird. Tales from Africa.(n)

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales
programme.desc: Why Baboon Has A Bare Bottom - You see there was a time when Baboon didn't have a bare bottom and he was very naughty. Baboon loved to play tricks. He played tricks on Elephant. He played tricks on Ostrich. He even dared to play tricks on Lion, the King of Tinga Tinga! And then all the animals decided it was time for the tricks to stop and Baboon to get a dose of his own medicine. Tales from Africa.(n)

programme.title: Guess With Jess
programme.desc: How Can I Make My Peach Soft? - JESS and the pups give Baa a peach to eat, thinking it will make a change from grass. But the peach is too hard. How can I make my peach soft? Asks Jess. That's the Big Question! He asks Mimi and watches her kneading clay. She explains she's making the clay soft. Jess tries throwing the peach in the air to soften it but all it does is bruise. Horace tells them that the water in his pond keeps his skin soft so Jess and the pups try to soften the peach in water. But it's still hard. They visit Willow who offers the pups some of her lovely ripe cherries. She explains that the cherries went soft and changed colour when they ripened. Jess realises it's the same for the peach. He waits for it to ripen and then gives it to Baa. It's delicious! And now Jess knows how to make a peach soft. Yippety yay!(n)

programme.title: Guess With Jess
programme.desc: How Can We Help Billy Stay Warm? - Jess, Mimi, Baa and Billie are playing a game, kicking a fir cone into a bucket. But it's so cold that poor shivering Billie can't kick properly. They need to find a way Bilie can stay warm enough. Baa's never cold because of his wool. They find a clump of Baa's wool on the ground but it just falls off Billie when Jess puts it on her – and Mimi tells them that glueing it on's a bad idea. What happens when it's summer and Billie wants to be cool? Maybe wrapping her in it, like a blanket, is the answer? It definitely keeps her warm - only problem is, she can't move! They realise that Baa wears a scarf as well. Perhaps they need a scarf for Billie? Mimi knits a tiny scarf for Billie, after twisting the clump of wool into yarn. It's perfect! Billie's toasty warm for their game of Flying Fircones. Yippety Yay!(n)
