programme.desc: The Case Of The Pocket's Present - Fuse asks Noddy to take a present to the Pockets. But when Noddy arrives at the Treehouse, he discovers he's carrying an empty box. The present, whatever it was, has gone! Noddy must investigate: where is the Pockets' present? But how will he ever find it when he doesn't actually know what it is? It's going to take all his detecting skills to solve this one!(n)

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2
programme.desc: The Case Of Fuse's New Game - When Fuse invites his friends to come for a playdate all they want to do is play his new computer game. But then suddenly the computer goes off. He soon discovers there's a power cut affecting the whole of Brickabuild. But who switched off the power? And why? Desperate to carry on with the game, Noddy decides to investigate: how can they play Fuse's new game?(n)

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Scritch Scratch - Raa Raa always scratches his claws in the morning, but his scratching post has fallen apart. He sets off to find himself a new one in the jungliest bit. When he does eventually find a new scratching post it is huge, how is he going to get it home again?(n)

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Hurry Up Raa Raa - Raa Raa has agreed to do too many things with too many people today. Will he be able to do them and keep all his friends happy? More importantly, will it make him happy?(n)

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales
programme.desc: Why Bees Sting - You see there was a time when Bees didn't sting. All the animals loved the Bees and they especially loved their sweet and yummy honey. The trouble was all the precious honey was disappearing and there was a honey crisis in Tinga Tinga. Something had to be done. Luckily clever old Tortoise has a cunning plan. Tales from Africa.(n)

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales
programme.desc: Why Peacock Struts - You see there was a time when Peacock didn't strut. He was a very proud bird and he wanted to be the best at everything. He wanted to be the best bird-brain in Tinga Tinga. He wanted to be the best flyer in Tinga Tinga and he wanted to have the biggest and the best tail in Tinga Tinga…. But as Lion so wisely points out ‘Sometimes it's not good to get everything you want!' Tales from Africa.(n)

programme.title: Guess With Jess
programme.desc: How Can We Hide To Watch Butterflies? - JESS, JOEY and JINX go to the Whispering Woods in the hope of seeing some butterflies, but the puppies are so lively and noisy that they frighten them away. JESS wonders “how can we hide to watch butterflies?” That's the Big Question! JESS decides to make somewhere to hide out of natural materials. The puppies and Jess try to build a hide out of stones but they're too heavy and all fall down. Jess thinks that something lighter might work well but when they try to build a hide out of straw it's TOO light and flies away in the wind. JESS is stuck - there must be some other material on Greendale Farm they could use. But all that's around them are trees. Jess works out that trees are made out of wood and there are lots of old wooden apple crates in Willow's Stable which will do the job perfectly. JESS, JOEY and JINX build a butterfly hide out of wooden apple crates and soon see lots and lots of beautiful butterflies. Yippety yay!(n)

programme.title: Guess With Jess
programme.desc: How Can I Go Faster Than Joey And Jinx? - It's a snowy day on Greendale Farm so Jess and his friends have a race down Cherry Hill. Jess wants to win the race but he can't run as fast in the snow. “How can I go faster than Joey and Jinx?” Thinks Jess. That's the Big Question. First, Jess tries rolling down the hill like the puppies but he's not a good roller so that doesn't work. Horace shows Jess how he slides down his slide in the pond. Jess tries again at Cherry Hill but can't get going. Helped by Billie and Baa he remembers everything that Horace did - pushing off, going ‘Wheeeee! and lifting his legs up - but nothing works; he ends up sitting in the snow and not sliding at all. He needs something that will move on its own like Mimi's trolley! Jess tries sliding down the hill on the trolley but the wheels get stuck in the snow. Jess decides to take the wheels off and see if the trolley moves faster. Jess whizzes down the hill on the trolley top much faster than the rolling puppies. It's brilliant fun and he's answered the question. Yippety Ya.(n)

programme.desc: Cleaning the Car - Peppa and her family have to wash the car when it gets dirty.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S01)
programme.desc: Lunch - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house for lunch. Granny Pig has made a salad but George doesn't like vegetables, so Grandpa Pig makes the salad into a dinosaur shape to help George eat his salad.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S01)
programme.desc: Camping - Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.(n)

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power (S01)
programme.desc: Underwater Art - ROBO G takes Calvin on a deep sea adventure to find what he needs to finish his underwater artwork. But when a school of jellyfish blocks their path, Calvin must summon his PLAY POWER to be able to finish his masterpiece.(n)

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas (S01)
programme.desc: Cecilia and the Magic Rubies / Under the Pirate Moon - Santi and crew go underwater to stop Escarlata la Pirata before she steals all the Magic Rubies from Giant Clam Reef! // It's a nighttime chase above and below the sea when Escarlata turns the moon into a fish.(n)

programme.title: Abby Hatcher (S02)
programme.desc: Bozzly and the Missing Pill Bug / Grumbles Family Reunion - When Bozzly loses his plushy Pill Bug, Abby and the other Fuzzlies try to locate it for him and make Bozzly feel better. // Abby plans a surprise family reunion for Grumbles, but has trouble keeping his relatives out of sight before the big event.(n)

programme.title: Butterbean's Café (S02)
programme.desc: The Glowberry Fairy / Hello, Marma Team - Cricket believes in the Glowberry Fairy, but the rest of the Bean Team isn't so sure. Is the fairytale real? // When Ms. Marmalady uses magical Marma-Hats to turn the Bean Team into the Marma Team, Butterbean has to save the day!(n)

programme.title: Bubble Guppies (S03)
programme.desc: The Police Cop-etition! - Stop, in the name of fun! Officer Miranda teaches Gil and the other kids how police officers use laws to keep us safe. Can the Guppies use what they've learned to earn their badges as honorary junior police officers?(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S03)
programme.desc: Compost - Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S03)
programme.desc: Richard Rabbit Comes to Play - Richard Rabbit comes to play with George, and Suzy Sheep comes to play with Peppa! The boys and girls don't want to play the same games, but they all like jumping up and down in muddy puddles.(n)

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! (S01)
programme.desc: Greedyguts / Where is Bali? - A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path! // Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them!(n)

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You (S02)
programme.desc: Blue's Rainy Day Rainbow - We're playing Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to play on this rainy day! We help Josh get dressed in his rainy-day clothes and skidoo to learn how rainbows are formed. We even meet a real rainbow!(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S06)
programme.desc: Ultimate Rescue: Pups Save the Opening Ceremonies / Ultimate Rescue: Pups Save the Adventure Bay Games - Marshall leads the pups when an underground fire threatens the Opening Ceremonies in this Ultimate Fire Rescue. // Chase and his police-pups must find the missing medals to save the Adventure Bay Games in this Ultimate Police Rescue.(n)

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines (S05)
programme.desc: The Gold Medal Games - It's time for the Gold Medal Games, and Blaze is ready to compete! But when Crusher cheats and sends his rival flying far away, Blaze has to speed back to Axle City to beat the buzzer and win that medal!(n)

programme.title: Rusty Rivets (S03)
programme.desc: Rusty's Warm Winter Games - When Frankie melts all the snow, Rusty and Ruby must find a way to continue the Winter Games.(n)

programme.title: Rusty Rivets (S03)
programme.desc: Frankie's Super Shoes - Frankie's souped-up shoes malfunction during the basketball championship game and Rusty and Ruby need a slam dunk of an idea to save him.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S02)
programme.desc: Pups Save a Snowboard Competition - Jake and Everest are excited for the Snowboard Competition, until they see the course is buried under a blanket of snow.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S03)
programme.desc: Pups Save the Soccer Game - Mayor Humdinger challenges the Adventure Bay team to a soccer match, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol are called in to play.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S03)
programme.desc: Pups Save a Windsurfing Pig - Zuma is on a wacky water rescue after Cornelius the pig goes for a ride on a windsurfing board.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S04)
programme.desc: Pups Save a Wild Ride - Alex and Daring Danny X are snowboarding right for Risky Ridge and need help from the Paw Patrol.(n)

programme.title: Top Wing (S01)

programme.title: Dora The Explorer (S08)

programme.desc: Dora's Fantastic Gymnastics Adventure - Dora gets to start the Big Gymnastics Show! But when Swiper swipes her special rainbow ribbon, Dora and Boots need your help on a gymnastics-filled adventure to get it back so they can begin the show! Fantastic gymnastics!(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S03)
programme.desc: All Star Pups! - It’s monkey mayhem as pups play kickball against Raimondo’s team, until an eagle steals the ball.(n)

programme.desc: Pups Save Sports Day - The All Star Pups are ready to compete in the summer sports day when Daring Danny X turns the field into an ice rink!(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S03)
programme.desc: Pups Save Old Trusty - Ryder and the pups need to unplug Old Trusty the geyser to stop water sprouting up all over town.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S04)
programme.desc: Pups Save Baby Humdinger / Pups Save a Pinata - Tracker has a dream that Mayor Humginder turns into a baby! Now it's up to the pups to find the special coconuut to reverse the spell. // Alex is hosting a fun party in Adventure Bay but is heartbroken when his special pinata mysteriously disappears.(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington (S01)
programme.desc: Paddington and the Treehouse / Paddington and the Monster Hunt - Mr. Brown is worried he won't get sleep since the kids will be scared camping in the treehouse. Paddington wants to prove him wrong but there is a lightning storm. // There's a monster in Paddington's room and Mrs. Bird takes him on a monster hunt.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S01)
programme.desc: The Museum - Peppa and her family go to the museum. Peppa imagines herself as a Queen in the King and Queen's room. George imagines being a big dinosaur in the Dinosaur Room.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig (S01)
programme.desc: Very Hot Day - It is a super hot day, and all the mud puddles have dried up, so Peppa and George play in the wading pool.(n)

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! (S01)
programme.desc: Barbabravo is not feeling well / Be patient Barbabravo... - Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?(n)

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You (S02)
programme.desc: Blue's Big Beat Band - Josh and Blue are starting a band! As we play Blue's Clues to find out what instrument Blue will play, we form our very own house band, learn rhythms, identify tempos, and sing, tap, and clap all day long.(n)

programme.title: Bubble Guppies (S04)
programme.desc: Guppy Style! - The Guppies hit the road to see a concert by Stylee, a singing sensation known for her fabulous styles!(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol (S01)
programme.desc: Pups Save a School Day / Pups Turn on the Lights - Alex loses his back pack on the first day of school! Ryder and the Paw Patrol need to help him find it. // It’s Chase’s birthday and the pups are planning a surprise party. A storm causes the power to go out!(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington (S01)

programme.title: Play School

programme.title: Imagination Train (S1)

programme.title: Mini Lessons: English (S1)

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.(n)
